Reviews.Content: I have had my Kindle Fire HD 8.9 for over a month now and I am so happy to have it.  It has fine screen clarity and good sound and it has been easy to learn how to use and download apps.  My purpose in purchasing a tablet is because we are looking at spending a lot of time in doctor's offices in the near future and wanted something to while away the time and keep up with email.  It has been easy to connect to WiFi at various locations.  We have Amazon prime so have access to lots of movies for free and certainly helps us while away the long waits at the hospital.  So glad we made this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD 8.9 or 7" size toss up
Reviews.Author: J. Bondy
Reviews.Content: My wife likes the KF HD 7" for purse travel. However, I like larger screen of the 8.9 for several reasons.The 8.9 is hard to beat on the lectern for notes.  When using a blue tooth keyboard it seems to be a better fit to the screen.  Magazines work better on the 8.9. Of course the movies are a better view on the larger screen too.  The 8.9 is not that much larger to stick in brief case or pack. Finally, overall I just like to pick it up and have the larger screen. Maybe it's related to my idea of a  pickup versus a small car. I will always like larger size and take the truck. Both of the HD's are working great for us. Thus my vote is for the 8.9.

Reviews.Title: I am in AWE!!!
Reviews.Author: Angela Ross
Reviews.Content: I write this review, just days after receiving my new Kindle Fire HD....First off...Amazon is da bomb...really...I ordered the Kindle Friday and received it Saturday!  I was suppose to receive it Tuesday....boy I was shocked and giddy...like a kid in a candy store.I must say that I read tons of reviews before I decided to purchase my Kindle, I had a Kindle Fire (a graduation gift from my sister) that I gave to my nephew because his tablet crapped out on him.  He really enjoys the kindle instead.  This was my cue to upgrade and purchase the new Kindle Fire HD.The picture quality of the HD is awesome...I watched several movies on it this past weekend and I felt as if I was watching my 47" HD TV in my living room.  The sound is good (wish I had purchased a case for it so I can watch hands free) laying it flat on certain surfaces affect the sound quality.  I had to figure that out the hard way....plus my son the genius told me so.I am very happy with my purchase and I highly recommend it.Thanks Amazon!

Reviews.Title: New Owner
Reviews.Author: FRB0807
Reviews.Content: I'm a new owner of a tablet and I love my kindle. My only concern was getting AT&T; service because I had some really bad service from them in the past and I vow to never return as a customer. I was glad to find out my current internet service offer 4G so I decided to purchase the kindle. It's so easy to download books and games. I also like the library feature. I would recommend purchasing a screen protector.

Reviews.Title: Great Product!
Reviews.Author: Rob
Reviews.Content: I was a little skeptical at first just like any good buyer since you usually get what you pay for, and when you compared the price of this to say the IPad your paying a lot less. Fortunately you get everything and more! This was a great buy it has a quick start up, very child friendly (I have a 2 year old) whom plays with it everyday, and also suits my needs for work and school. So I would absolutely recommend this to anyone that wishes to buy a nice tablet for work, play, or anything else that someone can think up!

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: Jamie Fornabaio
Reviews.Content: I am very happy with how fast it is. My kids hardly let me use it there are so many games and apps. I like that I can set the parental controls so they can't buy things without permission too.

Reviews.Title: Worth the wait!!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I LOVE my Kindle Fire HD 8.9"  This replaces my first gen Kindle Fire.  I am using my Fire HD so much more than the previous version.  I can't find anything I'm unable to do on it, inverse to the first gen.  Surfing on the web FAST and beautiful.  I purchased a keyboard case for it and use this constantly at work with Evernote.  I love how easy it is to add and find video content to add and then I can access through my Blu-ray player.  Way easier to search on the Kindle than via the player.  Given the daily usage and the multiple ways I use this it was money well spent.  Best purchase I've made in a long time!!!  The only con I've found is the one-way camera.  To take pictures of whiteboards for notes to share, it would be nice to have the rear-facing camera.... but I don't know if I'd be willing to pay more for it.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD 8.9 Rules!
Reviews.Author: Ann
Reviews.Content: This wonderful little device (already own Kindle Fire, 1st generation too) delivers everything is promises and more...had a little hard time setting up yahoo mail on it, but that was problem with yahoo, I am sure.The screen is BIG and wonderful....downloads are fast...dolby audio is great for the size they are, and nice to have on device, rather than have to hook up other listening itemsI have only had it a few weeks (Amazon tech support is GREAT)  I would highly recommend this device to everyone!

Reviews.Title: Great buy
Reviews.Author: Maile A. Lee
Reviews.Content: I think I fell in love!!! This was the best buy yet! I needed something that was portable and on the go but could also connect outside of Wi-Fi and I found it!

Reviews.Title: So Much Fun!
Reviews.Author: diangirl
Reviews.Content: This little gadget is awesome fun! It took me awhile to get used to it because it's so much different from my usual Windows OS, but once I got it, my netbook went into retirement. Amazon has provided an App Store so that you can get apps that are compatible with the Kindle Fire (as some you find elsewhere are not), and I have downloaded a few that I like, especially Yukon Gold Solitaire. I watch TV shows, read my email and look at the news; use my blog site, and shop. It came with a free 30 day membership to Amazon Prime of which I am taking full advantage. I like free shipping!!I have to admit, it has a few cons. I'm still getting used to the touch keyboard and I hate the word prediction function, which I can't seem to get turned off. Also, there is no way to get pictures into it directly from a flash card or disc. You can use the Amazon Cloud Drive, Dropbox (or the like), or plug it in to your PC and drag and drop the files. This makes it useless to take on vacation as I like to put my pictures from the day on my computer to look at directly from the flash card.You will want a stylus for some of the tiny buttons. The HD picture quality is great, but there is quite a lot of glare, so I got an anti glare screen protector. Warning!!! These are very difficult to apply! Read the instructions and be prepared to use the words your mother warned you against! As for the camera, it only faces inward (towards your face), so you can't take pictures of anything in front of you--but you can use your phone for that. And get a charger; it doesn't come with one.The battery life seems pretty good. I've watched a couple of TV shows and more before it tells me to plug it in. It's very light weight. The sound quality is excellent. I may have to get some speakers to take better advantage of that.The Kindle Fire HD 8.9" met all of my expectations and is a lot of fun. I got a good deal on it, so I feel it was good value for money. If you want to watch TV or movies, check your email, play games, read, shop and a lot more while away from home or your PC---and if you want a cool new toy---get yourself one of these!

Reviews.Title: Reflections on my kindle fire hd 8.0"
Reviews.Author: Sarah "thebookpusher"
Reviews.Content: I have had every single Kindle model created before this one.  I have loved every single one and passed them down the family as soon as the latest and greatest came out.I use the Kindle for everything Amazon wants us to use it for.  I stream prime movies.  I load movies and take them to faraway places where I connect them to television sets using an hdmi cable and show them.  I watch movies I buy on them.  I purchase from Amazon wirelessly on my Kindle Fire.  I buy and play apps.As a librarian I share information on my Kindle at school, amazing students by swyping on the keyboard.  I pull up photos of giraffes and antelopes in bright crisp colors.  When I model reading with a class I read on my Kindle....and look words up on the dictionary to model that.  The Kindle is always with me at school.When I travel or have an appointment I read quietly in the waiting room or the airport or the car.  The Kindle is always with me away from home.Amazingly, the battery life has never been an issue.  I charge it where I can and it is usually ready for me when I need it.I have only one complaint.  The location of the micro usb for charging.  It is near impossible to stand the Kindle Fire HD 8.9 up and charge it simultaneously.  Even on a soft surface like an ottoman (where I put it while I am streaming movies and knitting, while wearing Bose headphones with my husband only yards away blaring sports on the damned tv) the Kindle Fire falls over or slides.  And I am using the made for Kindle Fire leather cover.  I don't know where the plug SHOULD be but I do know where it SHOULDN'T be...and that is on the bottom when the Kindle is in landscape mode.I love my Kindle Fire HD 8.9.  I will certainly buy the "next" model and pass this one down because that is what kind grannies do. But I hope the next model will have figured out where that micro usb should be located....

Reviews.Title: 8.9", Wifi, 32 GB, without Special Offers.
Reviews.Author: Mark Bickham "Dillannj"
Reviews.Content: This unit is actually very nice looking. The display is crisp and clear, especially while viewing movies, etc. The best part of this unit for me is the sound: It's really pretty awesome.Pros:Great Display.Awesome sound.Easy to navigate.Seems to have long battery life.Charges quick.Cons:Typing is cumbersome and slow. I was amazed at how easy it is to type on my iPad vs the Kindle. I'm a writer and was hoping to use it for stories and journaling, but that won't work for me. (This is my experience). The bar with matching words or similar words that pops up causes all words typed to be underlined... this also prevents the space bar from registering sometimes, which is a real handicap for a fast writer.The unit also "sometimes" won't load content. I restart it and it works fine, but it's still annoying when it happens.Overall, I like it and have no regrets thus far.

Reviews.Title: Absurdly in love with my new Fire
Reviews.Author: TartanCat "indiasbelly"
Reviews.Content: I had an OLD kindle and decided that I had finally had it with the clumsy chapter navigation.  I use my Kindle as my primary reading source and the old chapter navigation was driving me bonkers - especially when reading a reference book where jumping around is pretty useful.I have a tablet PC, but it's not easy to access your books and videos from Amazon that way.  I am a software developer and very comfortable with computers, but nobody wants to see that you need to update something before you can sit down and read a book or watch a video.  Still, I really didn't think I'd be using the Fire for anything but books because I had my tablet.Wrong.  I use my Fire all the time.  For books, videos, games, surfing the web before bed.  Love it so much.Highlights for me:- Navigation on the device itself (between books, videos, games, etc) is very intuitive and easy.  You can move through the categories or choose something from the list of recently accessed items.  Very user friendly interface to learn and re-use.- The chapter navigation in all of the books I have tried is improved immensely.  It makes using my Fire for reference books easy.  And when I forget what happened a couple of chapters ago in a novel, skipping back very quickly to remind myself is easy.- Streaming videos from Amazon Prime in bed with headphones while my husband is asleep lets me catch up on "Me TV" without waking the baby in the next room or him.- Swype on the onscreen keyboard.  Typing on any smartphone/tablet style device without Swype is just plain silly.  Swype makes it so fast and so easy.  Love Swype.  Love, love, love Swype.- Web surfing anywhere in the house just got a lot easier.  My tablet gets hot and it feels less portable/more breakable for some reason.  If I just want to surf, the Fire is ready, willing, portable and fast!Cons (so far):- Sometimes the browser gets stuck and has to be closed and reopened.- Amazon should really include the AC adapter for what they call "fast" charging and what I call "normal" charging.  It's only $10, but it's just silly it isn't standard equipment.- I wish the headphone jack and mini USB port were easier to find in the dark.

Reviews.Title: Apple Who?
Reviews.Author: Harperblue
Reviews.Content: The Kindle Fire provides everything I need in a tablet and then some.  It is a fantastic bit of technology, with the clarity, vividness and sound being top notch.  One of my favorite things is Kindle Time for kids.  Great way for kids to enjoy the tab while giving parents peace of mind that they will not get into anything they shouldn't.  For three bucks a month you have a boat load of things to choose from for kids.  Books, videos, learning apps.  Very cute how it says "Suzie's Kindle", when you sign into Kindle Time.  I purchased the Fire with "special offers", and I gotta tell you, it was well worth the discount.  It is not intrusive at all.  The special offers only appear when the tab hibernates.  Look, why would you want to pay the crazy prices that other company charges? Standing in line overnight to pay exhorbitant prices just to say "look, I got the latest blank", just isn't my thing. And by the way, I used that other tab for 6 months and got rid of it.  So I can't be accused of talking about something without having tried it.  Bottom line...Amazon has the better product for the best price.

Reviews.Title: My Kindel Fire HD 8.9
Reviews.Author: Carol Dooms
Reviews.Content: I like how i can do so many things with it. Amazon has been very helpfui with any questions i have had.

Reviews.Title: brother loves it
Reviews.Author: Patricia E. Small "mimi"
Reviews.Content: the larger screen for browsing is much easier on the eyes than my original kindle. The HD graphics makes for a more enjoyable game play

Reviews.Title: I LOVE this tablet and the size is perfect
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I first bought the kindle fire hd smaller version and after I was so impressed with that kindle I had to buy this one and I am not disappointed.  From the speakers to the picture quality I am so satisfied with this kindle overall.  I am going to be purchasing one for my whole family.  The best part of this kindle is I am an online college student so I can send my books to my kindle and I can read them anywhere.  Also because I am a college student I get amazon prime for 39.00 a year with prime movies and tv shows we don't subscribe to cable anymore and we can hook up our kindles to our tv for viewing.  Just an awesome deal all the way around so happy with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Pleasant surprise
Reviews.Author: Dolores
Reviews.Content: The Kindle Fire was a gift from my husband.  I am definitely not a techy type of person and I was at first doubtful.  I have become addicted to my Kindle!  I read a lot and love the Library set up, and the fact that I can order from my Kindle as easily as from my computer.  I use it exclusively for my email now, and have quick access to the weather and other on line items I used to occasionally check, but now check more frequently.  I can easily take it where ever I go.  I find the battery lasts a little longer that advertised - definitely a pleasant bonus. I have the quick charger with it, and although I have never timed it, it charges quickly, and my Kindle is ready to go again. I also have the case, and that is a big help. Just close the case and my Kindle takes a nap until I am ready to use it again.

Reviews.Title: So completely happy!
Reviews.Author: Sherry & Ken
Reviews.Content: We purchased the Kindle Fire HD 8.9 after looking at tablets for a while.  It seemed like the best price for the quality and what we were looking for.  We are so very happy with it and say to anyone looking for a tablet, this is exactly what we wanted and you would love it.  Amazing sound and picture quality... I like it much better than my friends ipad. shshhhhh, don't tell them!  :)  We love, love, love this device and recommend it to anyone.Thanks for creating such an amazing product!!!!

Reviews.Title: Fabulous Tool Which Is As Good as Any on the Market
Reviews.Author: David
Reviews.Content: I'm not a techie, but the Kindle Fire HD 8.9 inch has done everything I want and more. My son-in-law uses is as a notebook computer, and has told me all the things he did to make it function as well as an iPad or similar device. I'd have to pay him to do that for me, but what I got it for was entertainment and it does that in spades. It is a great eReader, streaming movie device, and in a pinch, can be used for email.  I love it and highly recommend it for those seeking these kinds of things and more.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire 8.9 HD is SWEET !
Reviews.Author: Thomas Wilson
Reviews.Content: Awesome tablet with many great improvements over the original Kindle Fire.  Love the audio, color, video resolution and glare-free screen.  Superb for content delivery of all audio and video products.  Great for reading books.  Much improved game and app selection from even a year ago.  This devices ROCKS, and excels at everything it was designed to do.  And don't forget to get Amazon Prime to round out the best entertainment value in the industry.  A great selection of free movies and TV shows you can stream via Wi-Fi at one low price is an outstanding bargain. Plus you get one free book loan per month and free two-day shipping on all your Amazon purchases is wonderful. For the money, a tremendous value over iPad, but I sure like the Apple iOS better than the Android OS.  But life is full of compromises.  You'll be very happy with the quality and features of the Kindle Fire and saving 200-300 over a similarly equipped iPad makes it all the more delicious !

Reviews.Title: Love my Kindle
Reviews.Author: CHB
Reviews.Content: After a lot of time spent researching what type of tablet to get, I decided to purchase the Kindle Fire HD 8.9 WiFi.  I am very happy and satisfied with my purchase.  I was worried that I would have some connection issues since we can only get internet use with a Verizon aircard where we live.  I have not had any problems and I'm able to download items and surf the internet with ease.  I highly recommend also purchasing the Kindle Fire HD Users Guide Book by Shelby Johnson.  I purchased this and it has helped me get very familiar with my Kindle Fire and is a great resource for the Kindle Fire that you can refer to as other questions may arise.  I'm very happy and I Love my Kindle Fire HD and if you get one you will Love it too! (I also did this review on my Kindle Fire.)

Reviews.Title: A Fantastic Start To A Bright Future
Reviews.Author: Alex
Reviews.Content: The Kindle fire HD 8.9 inch is a marvelous piece of work. It is so comfortable to hold and looks very elegant. Its display is 1920p by 1080p and has beautiful sound quality with its Dolby Digital sound. Althugh the User Interface (UI) lacks in quality, the UI is a different step to those other tablet manufacturers. Amazon surely tried a new approach and I can tell they tried to create something unique and beautiful, and I fell they indeed did so. Though the lack of Adobe Flash Player was not at all Amazon's fault since Adobe decided to not provide its software for further mobile devices, the kindle fire has the HTTP5 which is sure to replace Adobe. I think if you are skeptical about this product you should give it a try. Even though it lacks in application availability on its store, it is gradually increasing its applications everyday. It is only a matter of time until the Kindle Fire HD proves itself a great tablet.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD
Reviews.Author: Kym Bell
Reviews.Content: I love my Kindle Fire HD 8.9".  Especially because I am able to review my personal and my work emails.  I love it because I like to read and I am able to do that as well on my Fire.I did compare it to an Apple IPAD, and for what I wanted it for and the cost I felt that the Kindle Fire was the way to go.Sometimes it will give me a message that SILK is not working which causes it "lock up".  I have not taken the time to check on this further as it does not happen all the time, but will be doing that.The battery seems to last about 5-6 hrs, not real sure because I am not on it all day to test that.Overall, I am really pleased with my Kindle Fire.

Reviews.Title: Awesome product
Reviews.Author: James
Reviews.Content: It took a little getting used to as my wife has an ipad2. Now that I know it inside and out, I absolutely love it. Dollar for dollar it just makes sense to go with the Kindle Fire.

Reviews.Title: Love my  Kindle
Reviews.Author: Ron A.
Reviews.Content: I have never owned any form of tablet before, this is my first. I was not really in the market for a tablet until I played around with a friend's iPad. So after doing much research I decided on the kindle fire 8.9. Is the kindle as user friendly, efficient, smooth or have as many apps as the iPad, no!! But, and this is the big But, my Kindle was$269.99 at Staples, this is much, much cheaper than an IPad. The Kindle is awesome, streaming is fantastic and the picture and sound are incredible. I use my droid charger to charge my Kindle. I will probably opt out of the special offers or advertisements as I like to call them.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: gongshi Zhang
Reviews.Content: In my opinion, it is much more better than ipad or ipad mini for someone who is getting tired of the ipad series. First of all, it impressed me when I first opened the box. It's black but looks really good. Don't forget the price. You paid the money less than an ipad mini and gains the experience as much as an ipad 4. So far, I am satisfied with everything about it.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I own a Kindle DX, Kindle keyboard, Kindle Fire, Kindle Fire HD and an iPad first gen.I'm not going to do an indepth review because so many others have. I believe it's sufficient to say that the Kindle Fire HD compares favorably to the iPad in most ways. The added advantage of Amazon Prime makes owning this little gem very easy. I can do nearly everything with the Fire that the iPad can do. I like them both, but the Kindle Fire is my favorite for reading, apps, games and movies.edit 30 days later;Just one crazy thing about this tablet, the front facing camera is awkward. I can't take a photo in front of me at all. Plus the software doesn't come with it. This quirk didn't occur to me initially because I have the iPad 1st gen which has no camera, so I didn't think of it.

Reviews.Title: Love love love
Reviews.Author: ashley
Reviews.Content: I'll say it again, love love love.  It really does have as good of a resolution as the Ipad with retina, but I honestly believe it's much better.

Reviews.Title: Pleased
Reviews.Author: Plainfield317
Reviews.Content: I bought this having only had experience with an ipad 2nd generation. I believe the screen resolution on the fire is equal. The sound is better. I agree that the placement of the power button is not ideal. I accidentally turned it off a couple times. Maybe a portfolio case will help me not to do that. Not any reason to avoid this device. I also agree that a camera that faces both directions would be ideal. I don't want to take pictures of myself. But, this is a super convenient way to Skype. Recently figured out how to get all my music on cloud player. Found a ton of free apps. Most of all, the screen functions well for reading books. It is as easy to set screen preferences on the Fire as the ipad. Change for reading in the dark, enlarge print, easy peasy. I think that for the price this is a big value. They will get me to spend money here, which is why the kindle is more affordable than other devices. But, Amazon has things that interest me. Obtaining content is effortless.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: Mrs. Henry A. Dyson
Reviews.Content: WOW! Kindle Fire exceeded my expectation! Wonderful! I love the books and the Bible commentary I purchased, the games, the music  and when I get on line for the News I love that also. I highly reccomend it for any age. I am a very senior citiszen and I love it.

Reviews.Title: I'M FIRED UP!
Reviews.Author: Eileen Leon
Reviews.Content: Completely captivated with the best Christmas present ever, the Kindle Fire HD.Can do most anything that my desktop computer can do,and in many cases,do it faster and better.Along with its countless practical applications comes a whole lot of FUN !

Reviews.Title: Love my Kindle
Reviews.Author: M Dunsmore
Reviews.Content: When viewing the different Kindle's available, I wanted one of the cheaper ones. My husband talked me into this one and I'm so happy he did. As for the ads, I've found them helpful and they are not the least annoying at all. I'm also not a tech person whatsoever but am able to manage the operations without reading the manual. Also, make sure you get the fast charger, you'll be glad you did plus it's only $9 if you purchase at the same time.

Reviews.Title: A REAL WINNER!!!! THANKS AMAZON!!!
Reviews.Author: Lois L. Jezek "jezzika"
Reviews.Content: DEAR AMAZON YOU HAVE OUTDONE YOURSELF. THE KINDLE FIRE HD IS SO FAR BEYOND WHERE YOUWERE AND WHAT WAS PROVIDED... THIS IS JUST GREAT... THE COLOR, SHARPNESS EASE OF USE,THE RESOLUTION OF THE PRINTED PAGES AS WELL AS THE CLARITY OF THE GREAT SCREEN TAKESYOUR BREATH AWAY... YES WE HAVE IPADS, BUT THIS FOR MY HUSBAND IS PERFECT...  HE LOVESYOUR BOOK SELECTION AND VARIETY OFFERED BY AMAZON AND WE MADE THE MOVE FROM B&N...;THEY ARE GREAT AND HAVE DONE WELL...BUT YOU HAVE IT ALL... WELL ORGANIZED AND TERRIFIC.THANKS, AMAZON.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful Tablet
Reviews.Author: M. Bailey "mom of 5"
Reviews.Content: I was not sure about making the purchase of the Kindle Fire due to a number of people who seem to dislike this tablet. I am so happy that I ended up buying it. I have a son with special needs who loves playing games on the ipad (used at the hospital he stayed at), but I didn't have the money for one. I thought that since most of the games he likes can be downloaded that we would see how much he liked playing on this Fire. What a great little machine it is! The games work very well. So far we have not had any issues with download anything and the apps are so colorful. Now my only problems is trying to pull it away from him long enough to enjoy it myself. I would like to note that we don't own an ipad or any other tablet other then the Kindle Touch, so it is hard for me to say how much better one is over the other. I also opted to get the plug-in for the outlet to charge with over just using the USB port. I also do not mind the ads, they aren't that much of a bother. If you are on the fence as to buying or not, if you know you like the use of a tablet then I don't think you can go wrong with this Kindle Fire for the price!

Reviews.Title: Beautiful resolution and a great price
Reviews.Author: Charles R. Boddy
Reviews.Content: The new kindle fire hd 8.9 has great resolution at a great price..i would recommend this..the bigger size screen is definately worth the extra price

Reviews.Title: Excellent Choice
Reviews.Author: Jamie Brown
Reviews.Content: I did my homework before finally breaking down and buying a Kindle. I am incredibly pleased with the speed, user interface, functionality, graphics and sound! This little guy is awesome - I highly recommend it to anyone searching for a tablet who doesn't want to spend a load of $ but still wants the convenience of a computer/laptop replacement to-go.

Reviews.Title: Bought for my husband.
Reviews.Author: Supermom3
Reviews.Content: I love the large screen. We have (2) 7 in and (1) 8.9.I will say that after 45 days the 8.9 HD stopped taking a charge. I called Amazon and they sent me another that day. Excellent service. The reason it stopped charging no know cause. I recieved the new one within days. Thank You Amazon<<<<<

Reviews.Title: kindle love
Reviews.Author: dallasgirl67
Reviews.Content: This is my third kindle. I started with the kindle keyboard, purchased a kindle fire in November of 2011 and today I received my fire 8.9 HD. I am very happy with all my kindles and highly recommend them to anyone looking to purchase a tablet.

Reviews.Title: Absolutely love it.
Reviews.Author: manuel
Reviews.Content: I bought it for $269 ($30 V-Day discount). I had owned a Nexus 10 which although has the larger screen (and feels faster) the price of $400 just does not compare.  Saved me a ton of money for pretty much the same Android experience.  And with Amazon's easy integration and specially with Amazon Prime it is easy to love this device all the way around.

Reviews.Title: Kindle died after 1 month of use
Reviews.Author: Alexis
Reviews.Content: I received my Kindle Fire HD (8.9" Wi-fi, 16 GB, without special offers) as a gift in December 2012. After one month of use, the entire unit died. As we all know, the KF HD does not come with a normal power charger, just a USB, so when I contacted Amazon customer service, they offered to send me the Powerfast charger for free ($30 value). They suggested that it was a problem with charging the unit, and if this did not resolve the issue then they would send me a new device.As I had a feeling it wouldn't work, but didn't mind getting a free charger, I waited 2 days to receive it and charged the Kindle for about 6-8 hours. Still nothing.Customer service sent me a replacement model very quickly. I am now using the new device but I am a little doubtful as to the quality and longevity of this product. Fortunately, all of my apps were saved in the Cloud so it was pretty easy to restore the device. A little more annoying was having to configure all of my settings all over again.+1 for Amazon's quick turnaround on replacing the item. And I really like the device itself, though it took a while to get used to navigating through it and the swype typing (which I LOVE). I also received a stylus which has been very useful.Hopefully this unit lasts a little longer!!

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD 8.9"
Reviews.Author: Sonia Johnson
Reviews.Content: I love my kindle for the ease it gives me in carrying around what im reading. It fits in my handbag easily and in the leather case it is protected from scratching. I have still yet to download songs and videos or use the skype features. If you are a book worm this is a great buy and the size is good and the quality and clarity of the pictures are fantastic.

Reviews.Title: A perfect gift
Reviews.Author: Mags
Reviews.Content: I got the Kindle Fire HD for my son for Christmas and it has more than exceded my expectations for it.  I have a first generation Ipad and am thinking of replacing it with the Kindle Fire HD.  I had gotten my daughter-in-law a Kindle a few years ago and she carries it in her purse everywhere she goes and he use to make fun of her now she teases him about not being able to part with his Kindle HD.  Thanks for having such a great product for a reasonable price it sure made this Christmas bright for my son.

Reviews.Title: Love It!!
Reviews.Author: Doris Jones
Reviews.Content: The Kindle Fire HD 8.9 is awesome -- I can't get anything done because I'm having fun with Kindle!!  Love it.

Reviews.Title: Super product
Reviews.Author: D. R. Clark
Reviews.Content: Great display, easy to use.  We're still exploring possible uses, but so far everything works beautifully. I've streamed a couple of free movies with Amazon Prime.  Lost the signal once but with all the systems in the channel it is surprising that it only happened once.  Deliberately stopped and restarted a couple of times and it never missed a beat.  My wife and I are reading the same book on this and on the older Kindle and the system doesn't get us mixed up.

Reviews.Title: I LOVE IT!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I just got my kindle fire hd and I must say I LOVE IT!  So easy to use and has all the features of a tablet.  Sound is great,screen resolution excellent... this is the best buy I have made in a long time!

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD 8.9"
Reviews.Author: Norma Morrow "norma kindle fire"
Reviews.Content: I really like the Kindle Fire I received as a gift.  The two things I would like changed is: the power button shouldn't be where you grasp the Kindle when holding it, I am forever accidentally turning it off; the sound keeps decreasing. I will be watching a movie and 3/4 the way through the movie the sound level drops and I have to turn up the volume to maximum and can still barely hear it. I called Amazon and they fixed it temporarily but I am having the problem again.

Reviews.Title: Great choice
Reviews.Author: Diane Boston
Reviews.Content: Got the 7 inch Kindle for my sons for Christmas and they love them.  When I decided I wanted a tablet  I went with the bigger Kindle for myself.  Love it!

Reviews.Title: I absolutely love it....
Reviews.Author: Valerie J Reyes
Reviews.Content: I have gone through several other Kindle devices and I've always been satisfied. I have to say I am amazed at this Kindle HD 8.9. I absolutely love it and will recommend it to all my family and friends.

Reviews.Title: Love it!!
Reviews.Author: Toots
Reviews.Content: I cannot say enough about my Kindle Fire HD 8.9"  I have not had another tablet and did look at several before buying.  It is wonderful, I love it, love it, love it!!

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: Gil L Nicholas
Reviews.Content: THis is a really good quality item and has a lot of great features. The wifi works well and it is easy to read on and is a great purchase. The only drawbacks I have with it is I wish the camera could take pictures without doing it from the face and the speakers arent to great.

Reviews.Title: Kindle is on Fire!
Reviews.Author: Gary C Warner
Reviews.Content: Fantastic product!  It is easy to operate, and offers so much...  Also, you can take it everywhere and can conveniently store it while traveling.  Can't say enough great things about this product.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD
Reviews.Author: Julie H. Rogers
Reviews.Content: absolutely love the Kindle Fire HD. Will probably buy another as our children argue over who gets to use it.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD 8.9"
Reviews.Author: R J Tracy
Reviews.Content: It is everything I had hoped it would be.  At times hard to figure out where to go to perform a function but with playing around with certain areas I can figure it out.  Display detail and size of screen is perfect as I am older and prefer the 8.9" screen.  Definitely a step up from my Kindle Keyboard :)  Wish the battery life was longer, though.  Feel like I am recharging it too often but maybe that is because I am on it for hours on end when reading a book.  Thanks Kindle for a great product.

Reviews.Title: Really great little tablet!
Reviews.Author: Georgia
Reviews.Content: I bought this primarily for reading and games and web browsing. It meets these three needs perfectly. The screen is very sharp and clear. There are still not quite as many apps as I would like...but they are adding more each day.  I would highly recommend it to anyone looking for handy little tablet.

Reviews.Title: Love Love Love
Reviews.Author: Ansley Monaghan
Reviews.Content: I bought my 1st Kindle Fire back in January of 2012 and thank goodness I did. 2 weeks later I broke my left arm and it was no longer comfortable for me to sit at my desktop computer to do anything so the 1st Kindle Fire was my life line to the world. When I started reading about the Kindle Fire HD 8.9 I knew I had to have one. Once it went on sale and I had some bonus money on my Amazon Prime credit card I bought one. WOW!!!!! I use it to watch movies, TV shows, read and surf the web. Excellent picture and sound. My nephew has an Ipad and let me just say for the money I not only would rather have the Kindle Fire HD 8.9 but I think the picture quality is much better. With so many free apps, the Kindle lending library, and being a member of Amazon Prime free TV Shows and movies you get a lot of bang for your buck. Not to mention I love Skyping with my nephews and can do so from anywhere in my home. I hardly ever turn on my desktop computer or laptop anymore. Owning the Kindle Fire original and the Kindle Fire HD 8.9 I really have all I need.

Reviews.Title: Not much of a book reader
Reviews.Author: Scott Parry
Reviews.Content: I never thought I would want a  E -Reader until I bought one for my girlfriend last year,(7" kindle fire) after seeing everything you could do with it I bought myself one (8.9" fire hd) and one for each of my daughters (7" fire hds),I use mine every day ,it is the best thing I bought for myself in a long time,I am writing this review on it right now. My girls use them all the time they skyp me every night when they're at their mom's house.they only thing I don't like is that it does not have a front facing camera and flash.

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Bryan
Reviews.Content: I like my kindle and for the most part it does nearly everything I want it to do. The only problems I have is that the ads are a bit tricky and yes the kindle does offer 250 mb of data for $50.00 but only for the first year, it's more like a trial than anything else, and I was hoping that on this kindle that a flash drive could be plugged in to make working on a document for school or work easier.

Reviews.Title: I am having a Great time!
Reviews.Author: Marsha Hirsch "Avid Reader"
Reviews.Content: I just came back from a trip and found the Kindle to be great. Big enough and little enough. I am a mac user and debated about the iPad mini or this. For reading the mini would be great, but watching a movie? The Kindle Fire fits in my purse, does practically everything else.I have one complaint. I wish it came with a user's guide. I am having to find things on my own or ask my children. I am a senior citizen and "easy" should have been included.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD 8.9
Reviews.Author: Sharon Hoyer
Reviews.Content: I couldn't decide between an Ipad or Kindle fire 8.9.Have to say I really love the Kindle Fire, great product for the money. I love being able to stream movies.I have a Mac computer, and iPhone so was not sure if I would be satisfied with a Kindle Fire, but I am more than happy.

Reviews.Title: It's great.
Reviews.Author: Roger Wright Jr. "brian fontana"
Reviews.Content: I LOVE THIS THING! It's faster than my friends iPad2 or mini. The hd screen dis awesome for netflix , YouTube etc. There are tons of free or really cheap books always available and I'm very picky when it comes to books so if I can find stuff that I like anyone can.Cons- The micro usb charge port is horrible. I've had to replace my original kindle and the new one due to it. It's a very commonly used port lots of cell phones ,gameboys have it etc. It's awful and antiquated on those too.I wish there were more apps available and when Google play or the Apple istore add a new app it can take months for the kindle Amazon store to get it. Sometimes they never get it.Otherwise I d rather have this product over the iPad.

Reviews.Title: Amazing!!
Reviews.Author: C. Glenn "CGlenn"
Reviews.Content: I just got my Kinode Fire HD 8.9 today. I must say I'm impressed! It sounds and looks amazing. easy to use with lots of nice features. makes having Amazon Prime 10x better, with the free monthly book and prime movies. plus it didn't cost 500 bucks. The only draw back is the lack of an expansion slot for adding more memory.

Reviews.Title: Love it, Love it, Love It!!!!
Reviews.Author: mciurej "mciurej"
Reviews.Content: My husband talked me into getting the Fire after watching me struggle to use a flashlight with my original Kindle Paper White.  I hesitated because of the cost but I am so glad he pushed me to get it.  I use it constantly!!!  I can read, shop, surf the web, play games or watch movies.  The picture quality is awesome, everytime I watch something on it my husband ends up leaning over to check it out just because of the excellent picture that it has.  If you are on the fence about getting one jump off and buy it now!!!  You won't regret the purchase!!!

Reviews.Title: A terrific Upgrade for the Kindle Fire LIne
Reviews.Author: JoAnne Kerr
Reviews.Content: I had purchased the original Kindle Fire in November 2011 and was very happy with it.  I was able to get a lot of free apps that made it easy to go online and could easily get my email from various email addresses.  Then they came out with the kindle 8.9 inch hd.  I decided to upgrade to this unit as I had a little problem reading somethings on the 7".  This new upgrade is fabulous!!  The resolution is as terrific as Amazon is claiming it is.  The dual antennas were a great idea.  I have wireless N in my home and was able to get 63 mbs with the original Kindle Fire and that was pretty good, just a little longer bringing up a web page, but now with this kindlle with dual antennas, I am now getting 117 and often times 130 mbs.!!!!!  Everything works faster, the upgraded processor is a plus.  I could not see paying $500 plus to get a tablet from Apple when you can get such a great one from Amazon for $200 less.  It was great that all the books and and apps that I had downloaded for my other kindle fire were available so easily from the cloud.  Amazon made it very easy to watch videos on the new kindle if you have amazon prime.  I decided to try it last November and so far the service has been terrific, it really is 2 day delivery, around the holidays it may have been a day more but that is understandable for that time of year.  The only downside I see to it is that a few apps that are available in google play are not yet available on the fire.  I'm hoping more of them will be available in the future.  The videos run very well, by that I mean Amazon instant video and Netflix.  I passed my other kindle fire to my sister and she is enjoying it very much.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire 8.9 HD 32G review after 6 weeks of use
Reviews.Author: SueEllen "SueEllen"
Reviews.Content: After a month and a half of use, I am still enjoying the Kindle Fire HD. I've been using it for reading, watching movies, playing games, email, social sites, and internet surfing. I have been pleased with all of my previous Kindle purchases, and the Fire HD is no exception.

Reviews.Title: Refurbished Electronics Great Value
Reviews.Author: Grammy M
Reviews.Content: I was first time buyer for refurbished product but very impressed with quality and it even came in original box.  Thls Kindle Fire HD is more power then what I was going to buy at higher price, and  well worth the price.  I was also able to buy a good cover and new charger, and get all for about  price of new 16HD I was considering.  Thanks for showing used products when applicable.

Reviews.Title: Lots of fun in a little package
Reviews.Author: Drider
Reviews.Content: This thing is probibly the best tech gadget that we have purchased.  My wife loves it.  I looked and looked, read the reviews and most of all I trust Amazon.  After we had it for roughly two weeks, we noticed a small hairline crack in the screen.  Im sure it wasnt there when we first bought it, and it hadnt been dropped.  I was really disappointed.  But after a quick 5 minute call to Amazon they shipped a new one, which we received two days later, and we were back in buisness.  The new one has been flawless.  I have the smaller HD version and I love it.  I wont say it replaces my computer, but I will say i use my laptop about 70 % less

Reviews.Title: Wonderful with issues.
Reviews.Author: nonpareil
Reviews.Content: I actually really, really love this thing but am finding - to my surprise - that software decisions apparently made at Amazon show (IMO) poor judgment. For example, I have had to "bother" Amazon tech support to get their very stupid auto-correct turned off. At first I couldn't even figure out why everything I typed was being morphed into something unintelligible. Then I noticed... you will realize that I am older, have come into the age of computers from the days of kerosene lanterns and outhouses. Well, in that I am not the Lone Ranger.If I had hours to read online instructions, I might have found how to fix that problem without bothering Amazon techs, but I don't have those hours. Again, I am not the Lone Ranger in that.I did manage to get my email set up by myself but cannot access my drafts folders on the Kindle. Tech told me they are working on that issue. Hope so; otherwise I can't do needed work from the Kindle. One-click payment as set up on the Kindle is not satisfactory as it does not show the total at check-out. Turns out you have to use your regular computer to turn that off. 'Nother call to tech support. There is no way to turn on video subtitles. Tech support told me I need to download an "app" for that but was unable to tell me which one would provide subtitle capability and whether it would be free. I use subtitles even to understand British English as across-the-pond actors so often swallow their words.But here's the thing: This device is absolutely fabulous despite these frustrations. And Amazon appears to be constantly working to improve it and claims to be listening to customer feedback. I suspect they really are. So I will take the extra time to communicate. And Amazon's tech support is the best ever!!! That alone ensures my continued existence as an enthusiastic Amazon money-spender.The picture is To Die For. Sound is crappy (of course - what can you expect?) but I use headphones - easy enough and then really, really good. Features are amazing for the money. I especially like the new Amazon "Auto-Rip" feature that has delivered both music and video without me asking or having to figure out how. If content gets too large for existing memory (inability to do later memory upgrades is unwise engineering decision, IMO), I can simply delete because it still exists in this unseen Cloud. All this is truly amazing and wonderful on my first-ever e-reader.

Reviews.Title: Everything I was looking for in a tablet
Reviews.Author: Jason Caldwell
Reviews.Content: The Kindle Fire HD 8.9" is a superb tablet. The interface is slick, easy to use and understand, even for non-tech family members. The new HD sound and video really look great watching Netflix or Amazon Prime. I was a little concerned about the prevalence of the ads as I chose not to spend the extra at that time to remove them. I don't think that I will. They are unobtrusively on the lock screen and that is it. Sometimes the ads are even worthwhile.There is a front facing camera which takes some decent photos and now that Amazon Cloud has integrated photo sharing as well will be a great tool for viewing those as well. Battery life is decent considering the amount of reading and watching I do on mine. You will not be disappointed with this tablet choice.

Reviews.Title: Simply the best Kindle yet.
Reviews.Author: gkk2001
Reviews.Content: I upgraded from the 7" monitor of the first edition Kindle Fire. The difference was well worth it.I can read the screen more easily due to larger size and much improved resolution. Sound quality is outstanding.I recommend to buy the Kindle dedicated leather holder, that was also well worth the investment.

Reviews.Title: My fav new toy!
Reviews.Author: Heather
Reviews.Content: Beautiful screen, fast internet browsing, easy on the eyes to read with and love Amazon Prime to access all kinds of great TV shows for free! Battery life is amazing too btw!

Reviews.Title: Like a laptop !
Reviews.Author: Ernest J. Grassey
Reviews.Content: Once you learn how it works vs a lap or desktop, it is a pleasant subsitiute for a more bulky computer to take on trips, or away from home or office.  The larger screen gives me more comfort than a phone trying to do the same function.  All in all, a space saving and convenient item.

Reviews.Title: LOVE LOVE LOVE it
Reviews.Author: KindleLover
Reviews.Content: Where would I be without my Kindle? The screen size is perfect, it's not too heavy, sound quality is great. Limited apps for viewing shows you missed on TV.

Reviews.Title: This is Awesome
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I take my Kindle Fire HD 8.9 with me everywhere I go.  It fits easily in my purse, and the display and graphics are amazing.  Far exceeds my expectations as far as the way it  performs.  Already loaded with books, games and my favorite app-Out of Milk

Reviews.Title: Buy It
Reviews.Author: Tom Roth
Reviews.Content: Awesome tool.I have just scratched the surface of what this is capable of.  What are you waiting for; buy this.

Reviews.Title: GREAT GIFT
Reviews.Author: DAVID J WATKINS
Reviews.Content: EASY TO TAKE ANYWHERE. SCREEN IS PERFECT SIZE AND THE PICTURE QUALITY IS AWESOME!! KEEPS ME IN TOUCH AND UP TO DATE DAILY.

Reviews.Title: love love love!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Jennifer
Reviews.Content: Love this!!!!!! My first tablet and I love it!!!! You definitely get y your money's worth with this product! My.3 &5 year olds love it too!!

Reviews.Title: Love my Kindle Fire HD ot make dinner
Reviews.Author: Nina Endicott
Reviews.Content: Such fun!  Books, movies, internet, music.  Warning...does not make dinner or do dishes!  Bought the 7" version first...loved it, too.  Now my son loves it.

Reviews.Title: I pick up my Kindle before I pick up my purse.
Reviews.Author: Cmk
Reviews.Content: I put off buying this for some time while I looked at every other device out there. I wanted it primarily for reading but I also wanted color because some of the technical books I wanted to get have color illustrations. I finally took the plunge and I am so pleased. It now goes everywhere with me. It has everything I need it's a perfect size, not too big and not too small, and it's really easy to use.Especially so because I use Amazon Prime and the cloud player with it. I already had an Amazon Prime account when I bought my Kindle and when it arrived and I turned it on all I had to do was enter the password for my wi-fi and it synched right up to both my home network and my Amazon account and greeted me by name. Nice touch.I am studying for exams and it's great to be able to get the book and then use the text to speech feature to have it read to me while I'm commuting or at work. Then of course when I need a break I just play a movie or listen to some music.No kidding this is a great little device and well worth the money.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD 8.9"
Reviews.Author: Beverly Cristofani
Reviews.Content: I SO MUCH LOVE MY KINDLE !!!!!!! I've only had it for a little over a month now & I am still finding out all the things that it does plus it is even more fun to shop for it and then turn it on & try TO DECIDE WHAT item/book/game/movie that I want to bring up. The games are the best by when I am in a more mellow mood I just want to read a book or watch a movie. I love taking it with me to my doctor's appt's with me to pass the time while I wait.

Reviews.Title: Wow
Reviews.Author: Beadereader
Reviews.Content: Everything I expected, once again amazon did not disappoint. Easy to navigate and the picture quality is the best. Love the size

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Melissa A Hunt-Wenndt
Reviews.Content: We love the Kindle Fire HD 8.9.  The larger screen is awesome!  I would highly recommend this product! My favorite is the abilty to have whispersync on books! Very easy to go from reading to listing and back to reading!

Reviews.Title: LOVE, LOVE, LOVE IT!!!
Reviews.Author: MARCIA
Reviews.Content: I recently acquired the new Kindle Fire HD 8.9" LTE because although I enjoy my original smaller Kindle Fire, I wanted a tablet to replace my HP mini-Netbook when I travel. I just returned from a trip to Europe with the new Kindle Fire HD as my companion and I totally fell in love with it.  The camera worked very well with the Skype application and I was able to visit with my husband and little dog while away. The video and sound quality was excellent. I loaded up the tablet with a book from the Amazon Lending Library and read the book very comfortably with the larger screen. My old lady eyes did OK with the smaller Kindle Fire, but I definitely needed the larger screen for a more comfortable read.  I also downloaded my latest audible.com book in the device and enjoyed excellent sound.  AND THE WIFI!!  WOW! Very powerful and easily picked up and logged me on to WiFis in airports, train stations, hotel rooms, friends' homes, etc.  The WiFi signal was strong and reliable. Quick downloads, easy Email access and the TuneIn Radio app worked great to pick up interesting local stations as well as my international favorites. Not only was I able to access the stations, my Dolby speakers gave me a rich, vibrant sound. I also loaded the device with favorite photos, knitting patterns, videos of our grandchildren and important .pdf documents.  Everything looked gorgeous, especially the grandchildren.  :))  Well I could go on and on but I think you get the idea. If you're looking for a good, reliable reasonably priced tablet to keep you company at home, or on the road, or on a trip to Europe, etc., I can't recommend this highly enough. My tablet will be with me on my next vacation and every one after that.

Reviews.Title: Kindle 8.9
Reviews.Author: deb828
Reviews.Content: I LOVE this kindle,the 8.9 size is makes it much more appealing to me. The Kindle over is just AMAZING!!!!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Kindle on Fire!
Reviews.Author: J. Stacey
Reviews.Content: This is a great tablet for the price. It does everything you can ask of it. The slightly smaller screen is no big deal. It surfs the web very nicely. This is my third Kindle, so I am a happy owner.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD 8.9" 4G
Reviews.Author: Jan
Reviews.Content: LOVE IT, LOVE IT, LOVE IT, Did I mention that I love it,, if you are in the market for a tablet this is the one you want, it does everything....

Reviews.Title: My new best friend!
Reviews.Author: Jack
Reviews.Content: My wife had the original Kindle Fire and for Christmas this year, I was going to upgrade her to a 8.9" Kindle Fire HD and I was going to start using her original Kindle Fire.  When it arrived, she wanted me to keep the new Kindle Fire HD and use it because I do more streaming of video content and music than she does, and she is familiar and used to her Kindle Fire.  Wow!  What an awesome present I just gave to myself...luckily, I had given my wife several other things for Christmas, so no, I'm not that big a jerk!  The functionality of the Kindle Fire HD is outstanding.  I purchase a great deal from Amazon and they are my exclusive music source now through their MP3 store, so it was only a natural fit that I would get and use the Kindle Fire HD.  I was considering an iPad, but I'm so tied to Amazon with my music, shopping, videos, and books (both e-books and audible books), that I really didn't want to pay more money for a product that would not do everything as easily as my Kindle Fire.  Don't get me wrong, I don't have any problems with Apple, in fact, I have an iPhone 5 and love it as a phone.  I just really love the functionality of the Kindle Fire and how seamlessly it integrated all the services I use from Amazon.  I turned it on and all my libraries were there.  My kindle books and my audiobooks were instantly available and easy to get to.  It really lets me take full advantage of my Amazon Prime membership.  Bottom line, Kindle Fire HD is a great product and Amazon is an outstanding company.  I've enjoyed my Kindle Fire so much, I bought one for my son for Christmas.  He loves it and uses it more than his laptop computer now.  It's also great that since I added his Kindle to my account, he can use all my e-books and audible books.  Thanks for a really great product!

Reviews.Title: Better choice than IPad
Reviews.Author: MumsyMom
Reviews.Content: This app has everything I need, plus it is so much lighter. Picture is great and I can sync with my Kindle Fire.  Compared both the IPad and Kindle Fire HD and the Kindle met all my requirements plus was cheaper. Screen is a little smaller than the IPad, but still quite big.

Reviews.Title: I checked out the Ipad first
Reviews.Author: katherine d brown
Reviews.Content: Comparing the Ipad to the kindle fire, this is a real bargin. It cost $200 less and does just about everything the Ipad does.

Reviews.Title: Great Product for you and the Kids
Reviews.Author: MadMan
Reviews.Content: My wife loves to read in bed, but the light does bother me sometimes. Plus the stacks of books get a little out of hand. Believe me Bookmans does not except that many books. I got her this Kindle so she can read any book she wants without having to store the hard copys. Plus with all the Apps. you can download I no longer have to watch Top Chef or Project Runway again --Hint Hint to all the guys out there-- One piece of advise BUY THE CHARGER, it takes forever to charge it through a computer USB port. Also it does not charge the battery if you are using it while it's plugged in to a computer, or if the computer is turned off. It's also great for kids. I bought the Kindle over an IPad on the advise of my son. My 3 year old grandson uses it and is very good at it making it a great teaching tool. If you have young children do yourself a big favor and get one they will love it. I only gave it 4 stars because I think the charger should come with it. For me it is like buying a new car and having to pay extra for the tires.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful!
Reviews.Author: S. Macnicoll
Reviews.Content: This is just like having your desk top computer on your lap! I have been reading books, going on the internet, etc. I notice that some apps that I have on my I phone are not available for the Kindle, so if you're a Gaberlunzie fan,  you are out of luck! The screen is large (good for my senior eyes) and there is a feature which I just discovered where you can touch it and it gives you an enlarged pop up of the screen. It's in the upper left corner and lol looks like a pair of eyeglasses. My battery ran down a couple of times and I realized that I was not shutting it down but just putting it to sleep. I'm smarter now. There are probably tons of things that I don't know still but will find out, since I just got this as a Christmas present and it's the end of January. Now I can sit in the living room and do what I want on my Kindle while my husband watches his shows. I can look at my email, check my bank account, read books, etc. right on my lap. The colors are lovely and there are lots of great apps!

Reviews.Title: Perfect for mom who cant get to use tv because kids are always on it or time to get to library etc etc
Reviews.Author: Lydia J. Hegge
Reviews.Content: It is pricey, but slim, awesome HD display, i cant complain. I can use internet, skype because of camera (nook doesnt have one), e-reader is nice size at 7 inches but i bought the 8.9 because i watch movies or tv shows when the kids are hogging all the other gadgets and tvs. The other awesome thing is when you are reading an ebook, you can click on a word and it will give you the definition right there in a text box!! I believe the nook doesn't do that. I am educated, but my vocabulary has always been a stumble block to my love of reading. I never bother to look up in dictionary because it gets to be so time consuming. Theres no b&n; in my area, closest is 90 miles. So I dont really shop there. Its really a personal lifestyle decision, but I am so happy with this gadget fitting my needs. There's lots of sites with kindle vs. nook.[...]This one I liked. Also I love saving money on amazon on many things that are pricier or unavailable elsewhere. :)

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet
Reviews.Author: kpc001
Reviews.Content: Did I need the tablet with ATT service? Probably not, as I find myself in wireless environments and really don't use the ATT data plan that much.  The wireless connectivity on this device is superb.  I never drop a signal, and connection with wireless networks is very easy.  When I use it, the ATT network works well in my area.  Video streaming through Amazon and Netflix is very good, and I don't notice any lag or jerkiness in the picture.  I find reading on a tablet more tiring than on a dedicated e-reader.  That's not the tablet's fault; that's personal preference.  But other users may find that to be true as well. I'm very pleased with the Amazaon App Store selection, and I have no problem "side loading" apps from Google if I need them (there are a few newspaper apps not in the Amazon store that I like to have access to).

Reviews.Title: amazing
Reviews.Author: kdm91
Reviews.Content: I love my kindle fire I got it as a gift from all of my family and I bring it with me everywhere couldn't have asked for a better present!! the quality on the picture is so much better than I imagined I am very happy with my kindle

Reviews.Title: the best tablet ever
Reviews.Author: sir.best_reveiwer
Reviews.Content: this is the best tablet!!!! you need to buy this its perfect.  its just like an ipad but BETTER a:its cheaper  b:its hd etc i could go on forever it works great!!  its sooo fast and tere is not 1 issue.  dont listen to the 4 3 2 1 star reviews only the 5 becasits the best tablet that is out there.

Reviews.Title: The big boy kindle HD is as advertised
Reviews.Author: Boudreaux
Reviews.Content: I graduated from one of the first generation Kindles to the newest, brightest and colorful model out there. Lots of great features a true media device.

Reviews.Title: Verry happy
Reviews.Author: Susan Oeffner
Reviews.Content: I love, love my Kindle HD 8.9.  The graphics are awesome, bright and clear.  The sound quality, when I watch movies is amazing for such a small item.I play games all day long and enjoy books, magazines, movies, shopping.I'm very pleased!

Reviews.Title: Student
Reviews.Author: William Krause
Reviews.Content: If you think like me you have two questions, is the device good for reading pdfs and is it worth the price? The answer on both counts is yes. The screen is large enough to read around 75% of the pdfs I load in portrait and the rest can be comfortably read in landscape. The screen is of a high enough resolution that the text is easy to read and is an improvement over most computer screens.As a student I have to read a lot of pdf's. Rather than print out hundreds of pages or read the pdf's on my laptop's less than HD screen, I can easily load them onto my kindle. You can also save a lot of money on textbooks if you look in the right areas. Tablets should be for reading and movie watching, both of which this device does extremely well. If you want flawless functionality beyond that, you're probably better off just getting a netbook. This computer will not replace your laptop if you're looking to travel light, nor should it at this price point.I have one problem with the pdf functionality. Sometimes I will load a book in pdf format for which the text is too small in portrait. When I switch to landscape the text is too large. I would like to be able to zoom out to a more comfortable zoom even if that means bank space on the margins.

Reviews.Title: Love this Kindle Fire HD!
Reviews.Author: Clary
Reviews.Content: This tablet was suggested by a relative and I am so happy I got it.  I love the tablet so much that I got another smaller kindle tablet for my grandaughter (Kindle Fire 7) . I highly recommend it!

Reviews.Title: Absolutely wonderful tablet for the price! Highly recommend.
Reviews.Author: happy feet
Reviews.Content: I love this Kindle Fire.  It works flawlessly.  I use it for personal and school use.  I am able to browse and read my textbooks with complete ease and great speed.  Amazon's Silk android based browser is very very good and I love the interface.  It is up and running in less than five minutes from the time you take it out of the box.

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet!
Reviews.Author: A. A. Walker
Reviews.Content: Compare to the iPad 4 this is a very great deal. Only issue I have so far is the web browser locks up when I come back after a while. I found that if you close the browser completely before you plan to go away for a while the kindle will not lock up.

Reviews.Title: Beyond My Expectations!
Reviews.Author: Chicago Sam
Reviews.Content: I've had my Kindle Fire HD 8.9" for a little more than a month and I must say it exceeded my expectations by a mile!  I have the original Kindle Fire, and while I love it, it was not a replacement for my iPad.  However, since I received my KF 8.9 I have only picked up my iPad when dusting.Perhaps I feel this way because I am completely immersed in Amazon content, but as a multi-media tablet, it blows the iPad out of the water.  It is very easy to navigate and has excellent screen resolution.  I uploaded all of my music to the Amazon cloud and now my KF 8.9 has made iTunes superfluous. And you get all of that for just over half of what the introductory iPad costs.  I'm glad I went this direction!The only thing I wish were better are the apps available in the app store.  I know that Amazon very carefully screens Android apps to insure against unsafe content, but I wish they would accelerate this effort as there are many apps that I use regularly on my iPhone that have Android counterparts which I can't get on KF.However, this is a minor inconvenience and one I hope will be rectified over time  In the meantime, I will continue to enjoy streaming videos, reading and listening to music via my KF 8.9.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD
Reviews.Author: C. Barnes "Realtor"
Reviews.Content: I gave it a four star rating.....because I haven't figured out how to use it to it's full or fullest measure.  I would have given a 5 star rating if it wasn't so hard to figure out for someone who is just entering the "tablet" era.  I have downloaded the instruction book but cannot read it and try out the instructions at the same time.....so will be ordering the paper back.  Hopefully I will learn to LOVE it like so many of my friends and family and said I will.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD 8.9
Reviews.Author: David N. Mead
Reviews.Content: This was a gift for my wife who is a big print book reader but not a techie.  It won her over in almost immediately due to the wide range of things it can do.  HD video is awesome, and the speaker system is excellent.  It is very intuitive and easy to get up and running with just a few references to the help screens.  We ended up signing up for Amazon Prime to take advantage of the extensive and free TV and movie libraries, and have used it extensively, watching the first two seasons of Downton Abbey on it the first 2 weeks she had it.  By linking it as a 2nd Kindle to my existing Amazon Kindle account used solely for book reading, we were able to access on the new Kindle Fire all books I had purchased on that original Kindle.  Being able to access the internet gives it much of the functionality of other tablet computers, and with 32 gig of memory, the video and streaming is seamless.  The battery life is much better than I expected too considering the data flow, bright high definition screen, and lengthy periods that it has been used continuously.  We are totally pleased with the product quality and performance.  Although pricey, it is very flexible in capabilities, and has awesome performance.  We also ordered the Kindle folding case and AC charger which I recommend.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD 8.9" is all you need in a tablet
Reviews.Author: Howard G Bundock
Reviews.Content: Easy, intuitive interface. Well priced. Excellent, large HD screen with adjustable brightness for glare or darkness. The best electronic book display ever with easy access to thousands of books for free or purchase at Amazon. Apps and books can be stored on your Kindle or in your personal "cloud" space on Amazon servers. Be sure that the book(s) you are reading are actually on the device! If no Wifi, then, of course, no access to the "cloud." Music also. Make sure "mp3s" are actually downloaded to your Kindle. The sound is quite good for a tablet and excellent when a headset is used. Easy connect to Wifi and the internet, a good browser included. Very easy setup to connect to your internet mail account(s). Lots of games available. The camera is decent for pics when you don't have your camera with you. I would buy this Kindle instead of other more expensive tablets. It has just about everything and you can even get one that connects to a cell phone network if you wish for a little extra. For home, hotels, coffee houses and airports with Wifi, it is all you will ever need.

Reviews.Title: Better than I expectwed!
Reviews.Author: Lawrence Harman
Reviews.Content: I have a 3rd generation iPad, which I really like.  I find the new Kindle to be much easier to read than the old black and white ones. And, it is easier to hold while reading in bed than the iPad.  Also, its wifi capability is faster than that on my iPad.

Reviews.Title: Update to earlier review
Reviews.Author: carl
Reviews.Content: I have been using the Kindle Fire HD 32gb for a few months now - and it is a good device - don't compare to other tablets - I received as gift and my needs in a tablet are reading books, entertainment with Amazon Prime, HBO GO, and download apps for reading newspapers, magazines.  As far as the App store - certainly limited as compared to IPAD, however - it's easy to sideload APPS from Android APP stores(go on Google or Youtube to learn how to do this.  As far as the browser - higly recommend downloading Dolphin Browser HD - much faster and supports Flash!!  Screen clarity is really good and sharp resolution.  If you want to run with the in crowd, and be like everyone else, get IPAD and waste your money!!  This device is perfect for my needs, recommend it highly

Reviews.Title: Love this Kindle Fire HD
Reviews.Author: Jan, the Reading Teacher "Jan"
Reviews.Content: Okay, I love books - the feel, the heft, the texture. I had used the Kindle app on my Droid, and completed a few books there but just not in love with that size.  But now I am loving my Kindle 8.9 so very much.  How wonderful to be able to carry one item and yet have entertainment, email + web access (from a hotspot) all in one slim package! It is perfect when I am here at home - easy to pick up and carry wherever I can get comfortable.  I am readying for back surgery and love that I can prop my book and  read to my content.  Plus I can get books with narration that pick up right where I left off!  The screen is easy to read for these senior eyes.  Plus, I confess, I am enjoying the silly games that my grandkids said to load - Where's My Water? , Cut the Rope.  Fun and challenging.  Thanks Amazon for making my book addiction even more fun!

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT, LOVE IT!!!
Reviews.Author: njn "Voracious reader"
Reviews.Content: I love my new Kindle Fire HD!! It is so much fun to do all of the things that I couldn't do before. I still love my old Kindle,[2 yearsold], but the Kindle Fire HD is a great companion piece. You don't have to ignore one for the other. I carry my old Kindle with me in my purse to be able to read where ever I go and then when I come home I open my Kindle Fire HD and enjoy it.

Reviews.Title: Awesome and fantastic product.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "Annette"
Reviews.Content: I know I wax eloquently in the title, but the more I use my Kindle Fire HD 8.9" , the more I find out more what is possible in this th amazing product .  First let me say that I am not considered a  " tech savy " person, so please consider this review as from an ordinary lay person who LIKES technological devices.You can be sure that the Kindle Fire HD is not a device that you'll need a lot of technical expertise to operate. It is very straight forward and the options are easy to understand. At this point I have owned at one time or another a Kindle, I have a Droid smart phone and my husband has an I Pad from work, so I also have had a chance to compare the I Pad with the Kindle Fire.  The Ipad devices do have larger displays than the Fire HD, but the crispness of the images on the Fire is every bit as good as the Ipad. If you regularly shop on Amazon , the Kindle Fire excels in being integrated with the Amazon store with the options of getting videos and audio very easily. From what I saw and experimented with on my husband's Ipad, there is no such easy integration on the Ipad.I know that the IPad is one of the most highly regarded tablets on the market,but I have to say that the price difference PLUS the easy integration with Amazon's huge library of content makes it a strong competitor and for me the price difference plus the easy integration with Amazon was the deciding factor for me and this was BEFORE I bought the device. Since I have had it in my possession, I can only say I have absolutely NO regrets!Also I find it easy to find great apps. The Android operating system allows you to install any app you want. The Amazon app store is the default app provider for the Kindle Fire, but if you want to get something else, you can manage, it takes a bit of doing to accomplish this though.I am also a prime member and this has made it a breeze to watch many videos and movies for free that you would have to rent if not a member. The Cloud feature  is also a great feature because for Amazon content, the cloud storage quota is unlimited!I would say that in the entertainment category, this device is phenomenal. You will be able to download and access many types of entertainment, such as music, books, videos, apps, the web, Docs, the newsstand etc etc. I could go on and on about this and the more I learn, the more I am so glad that I decided to get this device.I would recomment to download the Kindle Fire HD manual, especially if you are not used to an android device. This manual has been updated for the Kindle Fire HD and even if there is a bit of difference in locating the options, it will be easy to figure out. Another good reference is " Help Me! Guide to the Kindle Fire HD: Charles Huges" . They both have a wealth of practical information. I downloaded these two to my Kindle Touch, so I could follow the directions when they were side by side and not have to flip back all the time.As far as any cons:1.  The power button seems a bit awkward in the portrait position because if you are holding the device with both hands, it is  easy for your hand to hit the power button. It might be better to have that button closer to the left of the volume button.2.  The directions for the web searches seem somewhat cumbersome  but once you go through the instructions, it gets better.I might have to update this review later on, since I have only had the Kindle Fire HD for a little while. I am going through the two manuals page by page and learning a lot. So far I am very impressed with what this device is capable of. That said, my husband loves his Ipad, but he uses it mostly for his work and does not deal with Amazon as much as I do. I do think though that he is coveting my ability to access Amazon so easily plus the video and audio capabilities!

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Virginia Acosta "9erfan"
Reviews.Content: I love my Kindle Fire, 8.9".  It is the perfect size.  I have numerous Kindles because I love the product and even though I was enjoying my 7" Kindle Fire, it was a little small for me in terms of surfing the internet.  In my old age (LOL), I prefer to read web pages on a bigger screen and the 8.9" totally fit the bill.  LOVE!!

Reviews.Title: My Kindle Fire HD "8.9"
Reviews.Author: chas. warren
Reviews.Content: What do I love about it?Everything:Wi-Fi: SuperbSpeed: BlazingGraphics: Outstanding color and clarity.Sound: Stereo, SuperbApps: What can I say? Fantastic!Weight: Just right.Amazon Cloud: Flawless and accessible .Conclusion: I tried the one with the fruit on it and decided that it was not what I really wanted. I saw the great price and features offered on the "Kindle Fire HD 8.9" and decided it was the one for me . Besides, when it arrived I used the money I saved to purchase some really great apps. Five Stars all the way. Thanks, Amazon. You're the best.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire 8.9
Reviews.Author: bigtrout
Reviews.Content: I was a little skeptical about purchasing the new Kindle Fire HD based on some of the negative reviews.  Boy, am I happy I didn't listen to them.  I love my Kindle.  It does everything that I wanted in a tablet very well.  You don't need a manual.  Just use the Amazon help pages.  I quickly learned how to use all the features using the Amazon help.  I think the picture quality is great and the sound is more than I expected from a tablet.  I have an older Kindle e-reader, but now I do all my reading on my Kindle Fire.  I watch videos on Netflix and Amazon and listen to music on Pandora.  The apps for news, weather, and games are all that I need or want.  I find that I am using it every day.  It has become a great source of entertainment.

Reviews.Title: Not new to tablets, have had a few...heres my take on this one
Reviews.Author: David
Reviews.Content: I received the 8.9 Fire as a present from my girlfriend for christmas. The tablet is fast, smooth and looks like the OS is Gingerbread. The keyboard gives it away but there are suttle takes in other places that could be ICS. regardless the tablet is very nice, the sound coming out of it is AMAZING. My computer speakers dont put sound out that good! time to upgrade those next, there only complaint i have here is it does not have Google Playstore on it, you are limited to Amazon app store, unless you want to sideload apps which is not that hard at all, just gives you a couple more steps.For cases, you should go ahead and spend the extra money to get that 54.00 case that amazon specifically makes for it, with the flip cover and all. it def protects it and they have a few different colors available, it fits very snug and secure...i should go leave that review on that page..but you should also pick up a stylus..that makes this thing so much fun to deal with.

Reviews.Title: I LOVE KINDLE  PRODUCTS!!
Reviews.Author: Gail
Reviews.Content: WOW!I literally take my kindle with me EVERYWHERE I Go. I started with the first one that came out, and loved it so much I bought my daughter one also. WELL, as newer versions became quickly available, I purchased those also. I was really excited about the newest KINDLE HD, I could hardly wait to get it. For Christmas 2012, I also bought my daughter the new KINDLE HD. We both never leave home without them. My entire family has enjoyed the benefits that come with having a PRIME ACCOUNT. "What else can I say?"....we're HOOKED!!Thanks,From Gail, the e-happy gal....

Reviews.Title: Love it!!!
Reviews.Author: Laurie A. Nahrebecki "laurie0674"
Reviews.Content: I love my new kindle as much as my old kindle(which I still am using)! The only negative about it is I use it to much and I am neglecting other things!
