Reviews.Title: Overall.very good
Reviews.Author: Debbie Schell
Reviews.Content: I really than like it.The only criticism I have is the silk browser sometimes freezes.  Has been very easy to figure out (I am not technically savy).

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Cincinnati Shopper
Reviews.Content: I'm really enjoying my new Kindle.  Still learning though.  I wish it would have come with more user info though.  I guess I'll pick up a "Kindel for Dummies" book.

Reviews.Title: Love, Love, Love My Kindle!
Reviews.Author: Noreen
Reviews.Content: I thought I would never give up reading paper books, but I was hooked from the first moment I used my kindle.  I purchased a cover for it that has a band that I can slip my hand into, so it makes reading while lying down so simple--no pages flipping all over!  Love being able to access the internet if I have access to WiFi.  Just a neat little gadget and so portable!  Just one problem--I read through so many books now and it is SOOOO easy to purchase another one!  TOOOO easy!  :)

Reviews.Title: I LOVE IT!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: darlene
Reviews.Content: I choose the 8.9 size because to me the other size was too small. It makes it easier for me to read my books, than having to read them on the computer. Plus I can do other things on here while someone else is using my computer. There is one draw back I wish that they would fix. I wish that they would come up with a chat program that would work on it.

Reviews.Title: great color and sound
Reviews.Author: Margie
Reviews.Content: It looked and performed like New . The power port was the only portion that shows wear. The battery life is lacking. My grandchildren are frustrated by the lack of memory to store videos for air flights. The streaming video functions are fine but show no improvement over the fire. I still would like a rear facing camera. I have to successfully save a video. Photographs are difficult.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Lana Deluca
Reviews.Content: I bought two of them for my granddaughters.  They love them.  Now I have to get one for myself.  So many things to do with them.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: Glenda
Reviews.Content: This was a gift for my husband for his birthday. And he is loving it! The price was awesome, so I could not resist.He has been wanting one for years. Thank you for all of your help in getting him started. You have never let me down.

Reviews.Title: Can't get enough of.
Reviews.Author: Judy weathers
Reviews.Content: Very satisfied I also have an iPad2 and I think it gives the iPad a run for its money. I am thinking about buying one for my other daughter.

Reviews.Title: Big stepup from my Kindle Fire 7"
Reviews.Author: lulu
Reviews.Content: This new Kindle Fire HD 8.9" has bright, sharp color and outstanding sound. I am so happy with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: wow!!!!
Reviews.Author: anthony rubino
Reviews.Content: Eceeded my expectations in every way!! bright clear screen, instant setup amazon prime is a no brainer. Verry easy to use

Reviews.Title: So far so good.
Reviews.Author: alan fitzgerald
Reviews.Content: I had trouble with the first kindle fire HD but,  Amazon took care of the return even though Meijer's where I purchased it refused toadjust or replace the unit.  After e-mailing and calling technical help @ Amazon the problem was resolved in a timely fashion.The 2nd unit is fine and a joy to use.  It will pickup known wi-fi addresses flawlessly with a strong signal.  If you're used to androidit is fairly easy to navigate with some subtle differences.My wife has a paperwhite that she likes very much.Tip:  Buy online from Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Addicted to my Kindle
Reviews.Author: Kimberly A. borgzinner
Reviews.Content: Since I work all day in an office on a computer, I did not want a kindle for "office" type work which I loath doing at home.  So, I purchased this solely for my entertainment.  That said, I love it.  Movies are clear and amazing, books are sharp and the larger screen makes them easy to read, love that I can shop amazon easily, surf the web, and play on social media.  I did purchase amazon prime to go with it.  Love my 2 day shipping on all my amazon purchases!!  The only negative, was there was only a USB cord to power it up, needed to purchase the adapter to actually plug it into the wall.  That was super inconvenient; include all the parts, and its a 5 start product.If my budget would have allowed, I would have upgraded to the HDX 4 core processor.

Reviews.Title: Why pay more?
Reviews.Author: Les
Reviews.Content: For the price, this tablet is quality through and through.  I had a Nextbook before purchasing this tablet was not impressed at all.  The Kindle 8.9 HD fills my needs perfectly.  Large screen makes it easy to see, button in logical places, screen display is clean and clear, sound is great with the 2 built in speakers.  I use it to browse when wathing TV and reading books mostly.

Reviews.Title: interesting change
Reviews.Author: Michael Rivera
Reviews.Content: I got this device primarily for ebooks, as my bookcase runneth over.  I have been playing around with apps, though, and have been pleased with the appearance and function so far.  I was using an ipad before, so it took a little getting used to, but it seems to be a lot of good looking features in a small package.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD
Reviews.Author: Terry McBride
Reviews.Content: Christmas present for my wife.  She hasn't put it down and today is Feb 5th.  Yes it is worth the money and the screen size and clarity is great.

Reviews.Title: i love my Kindle
Reviews.Author: miskryie
Reviews.Content: I haven't owned a Kindle before, I was on a Toshiba Thrive prior....but I love my Kindle and I have only had one problem once where I thought it was "zapped" out, possibly fried because it wouldn't reboot...but then I got on with customer service, got it reset and it has been fine since.Amazon customer service really rocks it.

Reviews.Title: Really nice product.
Reviews.Author: J. Smiley "obiwan"
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my wife and she really likes it for going onto the internet and playing games.  She says it is to heavy for reading and uses her old Kindle for reading. Kind of disappointed that right after I bought they lowered the price...but hey that happens.

Reviews.Title: More than I expected!
Reviews.Author: Heath Carnicom
Reviews.Content: The screen is much larger and brighter, and silk is not too bad. Great for school, work, and reading in bed.

Reviews.Title: I love My Kindle
Reviews.Author: gabbygirl
Reviews.Content: I love my Kindle Fire. It goes where I go. I can go on internet, check my email, watch movies, TV shows, play games and download books to read anytime I want. What in the world did I do before I had My Kindle Fire??

Reviews.Title: It's a keeper.
Reviews.Author: Jeannette A. Phillips
Reviews.Content: I just gave it 3 stars b'cuz there are a lot of features that auto add themselves and clutter the interface, I don't like all of the sales pitches and some of the operations are not obvious, for examptle; I find deleting old files, personal letters and unwanted apps more trying and had to dig deep to find out how to do so.  They don't always delete even after they ask me if I'm sure that I want to delete those files.  Personal letters that sit on your desktop seem to eventually fade but I haven't yet found out how to delete them once I've read them.  You should be able to simply select them with a right click and be given option, like delete?, move? save? etc, but no.  Otherwise, I love the page look options, when reading a book, the ability to check books out from my library and the size of the book.  It also responds well to wireless local networks.

Reviews.Title: very enjoyable
Reviews.Author: dennis cece
Reviews.Content: have read many books through my library and through amazon books. Very easy to use and carry with me on a plane.

Reviews.Title: Love my Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: B.A.
Reviews.Content: This product works as it should and was promoted to do what it does.  I am satisfied with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: James Wade
Reviews.Content: great little tablet for everyday use would recommend one to my friends. works great with it's wireless keyboard. thanks for it

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Joanie L. Moore "PicWoman"
Reviews.Content: Works great, no problems. I use it all the time and it is my "right hand" machine. Great little kindle.

Reviews.Title: My wife can't put it down
Reviews.Author: Barney R
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a gift for my wife at Christmas and since she has unwrapped it, I think she has gone through about thirty books already.  since we are retired, she normally reads books all day, but since she has the new Kindle, It is open from the time she wakes up till she goes to bed at night.  Now I'm not so sure it was a good idea, but after 50 years together I can hardly deny her anything she wants.

Reviews.Title: Wow
Reviews.Author: Marie
Reviews.Content: This was an upgrade from the original Kindle Fire. The Kindle Fire HD 8.9 is like having a laptop, only easier to carry around. I would recommend this to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Better then the ipad
Reviews.Author: Cassie
Reviews.Content: Cheeper then a ipad and works just as well. I can get all the apps I want and has the kindle built in! Got on sale and couldn't be more happy!

Reviews.Title: Gorgeous HD and much more affordable than an IPad
Reviews.Author: Mrs Greinke "Joanne"
Reviews.Content: I purchased one of these for myself a few months ago and I love it. I purchased a second one for my husband when he sold his original Kindle (e-reader only) and the Samsung tablet that he has is now used primarily at work. This awesome 8.9" HD Kindle Fire is a tablet and a reader with so many extra features. I know that I've only tapped into a small portion of what it can do but look forward to continuing to learn more about it and all of the cool stuff that it does. An added bonus...it's much more affordable than an IPad at a starting price of $249.00. Amazon frequently has specials on their Kindles. Check back frequently because you never know when they'll be available at a discounted price.

Reviews.Title: Needs help
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Wanting in some critical areas.Specifically the app store and Internet access. Bought this awhile ago and after using it for a few months I found it is a good reader and decent for watching movies but the more I used it I found it extremely weak for internet use and the availability of some basic apps.I got to revisit this relatively inadequate device for more advanced operations after looking my Note 8.0. Like moving from a Jag to a Yugo.What I don't known is whether the internet issue is related to the POS Silk app for browsing. It constantly freezes and  with every click.The app store has no other web browser available. You now realize that even though it acts like a droid it is more locked down than Apple.Don't buy. There are lots of better tabs out there.

Reviews.Title: Best purchase I have made in a long time.
Reviews.Author: Bullet824
Reviews.Content: I asked my sister, I call her Miss Gadget and I knew she would know which one would suit my needs best. I use it in church for the bible app, I use it at work to read E-mail, and I use it at home for games and browsing the web. I would recommend it to anyone. If you like to read or any of the above choices this would be a great buy.Thank you,Happy

Reviews.Title: great purchase
Reviews.Author: lisa steele
Reviews.Content: awesome,so glad I went this route rather than the ipad. My dughter, an ipad owner, suggested I get a tablet with a USB port

Reviews.Title: Lacking proper instructions for its usage
Reviews.Author: Ray
Reviews.Content: Found nothing in package to help or aid an unknowlegeable user into the use of this item.It is not the easiest Pad to use without the smplified instructions included. Shoud have included a user manual

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire 8.9"
Reviews.Author: sonflower
Reviews.Content: I"m disappointed with this item. The battery life is not nearly as long as specified. I have troule getting e-mails and had to restart this several times. I even had to send one back and get another one only to encounter the same issues. If youre just going to use this to read it's fine. If I would have known I would have purchased a different device.

Reviews.Title: KindlefireHD 8.9
Reviews.Author: Orthel Grapine
Reviews.Content: I have found this kindle hd to be rather slow,  it freezes a lot, it gets hot during usage . Another fact is that all my digital games items that I bought have not transferred to this kindle. Will be contacting customer support

Reviews.Title: Looks great, purposely crippled for some reason though....
Reviews.Author: Oren
Reviews.Content: The tablet looks beautiful; its slim, light, fast and the display is very bright and sharp. However, ive you've ever used another android device, this thing is going to make you really mad. Its impossible to access the google play store without rooting it, which can eaisly brick the device, rendering it completely useless untill you send it in. There is just way too much available on google play for Amazon to just block it on a device that would be perfect for it. There are a couple other apps that do work for searching/installing new apps without using Amazons app store, which is the only reason I didnt return it. So far about 90% of the apps that Amazon charges for are legaly available for free elsewhere.... The default "carousel" home screen is awkward and clunky. There are some other options out there, but you can never completely get rid of the horrid home screen. You also have to pay Amazon if you want the advertisements to be taken off your lock screen.... Yes, even after you BUY it, you are still forced to view ads unless you give them even more money.In hindsight, I really wish I would have bought a different, un-crippled android tablet. However if you are already an Amazon prime member, and do a lot of reading, then this could be a good tablet for you. Personally, I will probably never buy another Amazon tablet, at least untill they quit trying to force you to use only their store.

Reviews.Title: This is our first tablet.
Reviews.Author: Gary Barclay
Reviews.Content: Heavier then expected and not user friendly at startup.  We do not have one of those fancy do everything cell phones so our learning curve isn't the best.  Just needs a little getting use to.  My wife is very happy reading downloaded books at night in bed, and I'm happy to be able to go to sleep with the overhead light off.

Reviews.Title: it is very nice..
Reviews.Author: Michael B. Garcia
Reviews.Content: I bought it for my mom to use her email.. it turned out to take too many steps for her.. I wish it had gps.. it doesn't.. the screen is large and nice.. it does NOT come with a charger.. it has WiFi.. for internet  browsing on the couch it is perfect.. for shopping it is nice (Amazon, hello).. 4 stars no charger and no gps..

Reviews.Title: great product!!
Reviews.Author: crystal myers
Reviews.Content: I love it....it does everything a tablet would do....and the side is good....it's not to small and not to big....it's perfect.

Reviews.Title: Beautiful and fun....
Reviews.Author: Theresa C. Morton
Reviews.Content: Great tablet.  Graphics are stunning and I am enjoying getting to know my device.  Have downloading several apps and they are fun and easy to understand.

Reviews.Title: Excellent for anyone who loves to read.
Reviews.Author: Marion Lane
Reviews.Content: I loved this Kindle.  I am nearly 80 years of age and I appreciate the light behind the reading ---which allows me to read in bed with comfort.  I can also make the letters much larger which helps me read with ease.  It is a blessing.  Marion

Reviews.Title: Very happy with my Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: Flamingo Gal "CMG"
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love this.  I have hesitated to buy a tablet and have always been very happy with my regular Kindle.  But with a sale price, I just couldn't resist.  I ordered the larger size so I could enjoy videos / movies more.  Glad I did.  Just watched a HD movie on it and it was great.  This combined with my new Amazon Prime account are the perfect combo.

Reviews.Title: Great, with a couple of caveats
Reviews.Author: nictoanamide
Reviews.Content: The best thing about this for me is that it will play Amazon Prime movies. Also, this doesn't come with a charger, just a USB cable. Don't be fooled by all of the charger reviews claiming you need massive power to charge this device. It will easily charge with any little standard cell phone charger with the correct mini USB connector. I bought one with more power after reading the reviews, so I do have a hotter charger, ($10 on Amazon) but I also found that it wasn't necessary. Just use your cell phone charger. So it takes an extra hour or two, so what? The charging icon is not automatically displayed. Go to settings and turn it on, or you can't tell its charging. (its also a very tiny icon, put on your reading glasses to verify that its charging!!)The unique part I mention is that it does not have the standard desk top format we are used to looking at. It does not display a desk top which you put icons or short cuts on in the traditional sense. It has a completely different way of showing them which for me and my wife took a while to get accustomed to. I guess someone is always trying to invent a better mouse trap, but its really not an improvement over the normal desktop scenario everyone is used to. But other than that its a great product. Frankly, if I had it to do over again, I think I'd just get the 7" screen. Even though this is bigger, its really not that much better for viewing than the 7", it just costs more, but that's just me.

Reviews.Title: I'm Very Happy!!!
Reviews.Author: laydeejay
Reviews.Content: This is the first tablet I purchased.  I wanted an alternative to my laptop for vacations or weekend trips. This seems to fit the bill perfectly so far at least.  I will have to monitor my AT&T; bill more closely because of the additional charges for the 4G access.  I purchased this item on QVC on a 5 monthly payment plan they offered during a 2 hour show for Kindle Fire HD, which is great for my budget because I didn't have to pay the whole price upfront.  I also joined the Prime club for all its benefits.  Overall, as I said before so far so good.

Reviews.Title: Grea Tablet
Reviews.Author: anjrose
Reviews.Content: I am so glad I purchased his table.  I must say my first impression was no good. He battery life was awful, but what I discovered is hat 1) my new awake case was depleting he battery and 2) when I connected it to charge it was automatically turning itself on this never truly completing a charge.  I go rid of he case and now make sure the table is off.  Battery problem solved. Now I love it!  Especially glad I got he 4g model.

Reviews.Title: poor picture quality
Reviews.Author: Smith
Reviews.Content: One of the main purposes for purchasing the Kindle Fire HD 8.9 was to watch movies on Netflix. The picture quality was so poor that I have returned the item. The website led me to believe that the picture quality would be as good or better than iPad, and it was not. I was very disappointed.

Reviews.Title: screen "sleeps" when I don't want it to. pain when you are using it in school
Reviews.Author: jennifer law
Reviews.Content: screen "sleeps" when I don't want it to.... I will be in the middle of typing on my keyboard and it will go black, or reading a text book and it goes black... something I never experienced with my iPAD... somewhat regretting my purchase because it is THAT ANNOYING.3 of 5 because its very useful for school. loss of two stars because of the sleepy screen annoyancebattery life is acceptable.

Reviews.Title: I LOVE MY KINDLE!!
Reviews.Author: Cheryl Anne Lindsay
Reviews.Content: I love my kindle!! It goes everywhere with me! I love that I get all the features of an IPad  but for cheaper! I also have the amazon prime membership. It's paid for its self a dozen times already!

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire Not For Me
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey Launiere "Tampa Realtor"
Reviews.Content: I was excited to get the Kindle Fire. I have another tablet that is heavy and several years old. I already have a Kindle Paperwhite and love it for the beach. I felt that I would like the Kindle Fire for reading in color and thought it would be a much faster tablet than my Toshiba. It is not. The picture quality is somewhat better though. My biggest complaint is that apps are only from Amazon, you cannot download apps from Google Play. Several of the apps that I like, I cannot use on the Fire. If I could do it over I would have purchased an iPad, or Galaxy. Might be great for others, but for me a waste of my hard earned money.

Reviews.Title: Yuk!!!! Hate this thing., have had it over a year now. Silk Don't respond half the time. very aggravating to use!!
Reviews.Author: catwoman
Reviews.Content: Hate this thing, it's gotten to be so aggravating to use. Mostly j u st read on it now! Hope someone has better luck  Just wanted to say Amazon called and told me how to correct problem, now works great!! THANKS AMAZON! SHOULD HAVE CALLED CUSTOMER SERVICE FIRST!

Reviews.Title: Love our kindles!
Reviews.Author: Alixe Ingoglia
Reviews.Content: This is the second kindle for the family. The size is great, the price is too. My mom recently gave up her iPad, and loves the Kindle just as much!

Reviews.Title: Buying this was a great choice!
Reviews.Author: Genell Goodson
Reviews.Content: I was on the fence about buying a Kindle Fire vs an Ipad but I made the right choice! I love it & wouldn't trade it for any other brand tablet out there!

Reviews.Title: 8.9 kindle
Reviews.Author: wendy kirby
Reviews.Content: My hubby got this for me for  Christmas ,I love it I have a iPad but it has a shortage in it  this kindle is better  for everything and a great price does the same as a iPad ,

Reviews.Title: Worth every penny!
Reviews.Author: lsal mom
Reviews.Content: I bought this Kindle Fire HD 8.9" when Amazon was offering $30 off. It made it only $80 more than the most expensive reader. I had previously owned a Kindle reader with a navigation button. When the button quit working I was unable to use the reader anymore. I began looking for a new Kindle and was unsure which one to purchase. My 10 yr old has a Samsung tablet which I have used on occasion and I find it easy to navigate. I have a Kindle app on my laptop which I used regularly but some books I wanted to check out of the library would only download to a Kindle and not a Kindle app per the publishers guidelines. So when Amazon put the Kindle Fire on sale I decided to get the HD so I could read and also use the internet and play games. I bought the 16 GB with Wi-Fi because I didn't want to pay for a wireless plan and we have Wi-Fi at home. When it arrived I opened it and put it in the case I had purchased and immediately began to use it. It is so easy. The screen is very responsive to finger taps and swipes, maybe even more so than the Samsung. I never have any trouble with my internet connection and pages load very quickly. At 39 I am in what I guess you would call the in between generation. Computers became a household item when I was a teenager and has progressed from there. I didn't cut my teeth on technology but I find it easy to comprehend and this Kindle is very easy for me. My 5, 3, & 2 year old all love to play games on it and read books. My 10 year old wants to play on it too. If you want a Kindle for reading but also spend time online and play games then this is for you. I typed this review on my Kindle Fire, very easy to use keyboard too!

Reviews.Title: Very happy with the Kindle HD 8.9!
Reviews.Author: Luci Baker
Reviews.Content: More than met my expectations. Love it.  I use it every day for so many things and it has enhanced my reading experience

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: Heather
Reviews.Content: I love the sound quality, camera, pixles. it is just great and i love it even more then my previous 1st gen kindle!!!

Reviews.Title: Nice.
Reviews.Author: Estella
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a gift for my granddaughter and the money was well spent.  It is her constant companion and even encourages her to read books!  So far it has been trouble free.

Reviews.Title: Did not meet my expectations
Reviews.Author: dancingsky
Reviews.Content: I love the Kindle but i was constantly having to recharge my Kindle.  I have contacted Amazon support for the Kindle and it has been determined that I need to return the Kindle for an exchange.  So we will see how the next one works out.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD
Reviews.Author: JOANNE PERRY
Reviews.Content: So far I love it.  My grandson told me I needed to get one, and even though I had no idea what you did with one, decided to try it.  Its been fun, and flustrating all at the same time, I'm slowly learning my way around it.  When I needed to call Customer Service, they have been extremely friendly, patient and more than helpful.

Reviews.Title: Great Product!
Reviews.Author: Barb Wheeler
Reviews.Content: I put off getting a Kindle Fire for a long time, but, not that I have it I'm wondering why I waited so long.  I love the size, the feel and the clarity of the screen.  I have only had it a short time and haven't gotten the full use of everything included on this Kindle.  So far it has been easy to use and all that has been promised.  Hope to have more Kindle time, soon!

Reviews.Title: I have really enjoyed having the Kindle.
Reviews.Author: Judy Bohne
Reviews.Content: I have some vision problems that prevent me from doing needlework anymore, which is  a huge disappointment. The Kindle allows me to enlarge the font and have a bright screen so I can read much more easily and not hurt my eyes. I have also enjoyed having Internet access so I can access my emails while I am traveling so the Kindle is very valuable to me.

Reviews.Title: a company you can depend on for Quality
Reviews.Author: john popp
Reviews.Content: just recieved it. my wife is very impressed. had bad experience with the first off brand tablet and decided to upgrade to a brand you can trust. Possibly we'll be ordering a second in the near future.

Reviews.Title: I can see why people pay up for iPads
Reviews.Author: Peter Levin
Reviews.Content: Nothing has gone well in my first few days with my new Kindle Fire HD 8.9. First I had trouble getting it to stay connected to my wifi network when I didn't broadcast the SSID. Amazon tech support helped me fix that with reboots -- which seem to be the recommended generic fix. If it slows down, reboot. If an app doesn't install, reboot. The New Yorker app doesn't work at all -- Amazon cannot connect to the New Yorker to download content. Apparently this is a known problem, but it took Amazon 2 hours on the phone to find this out. I think the app vendors aren't making the Kindle (in all its flavors) high priority targets, thus quality assurance is neglected.Nice display, nice size.AC Adapter should be standard in the box instead of an extra cost option -- it's a necessity.

Reviews.Title: Kindle
Reviews.Author: Bert Sutherland
Reviews.Content: Really love my Kindle!  Great buy. Easy to use. Can do everything I want with it. It's a very good deal.

Reviews.Title: Kindle
Reviews.Author: S. Pikula "Fireball"
Reviews.Content: I love my new Kindle,  my first device, so I'm learning lots of great new ways to have fun on It.  Great device.

Reviews.Title: Happy with purchase
Reviews.Author: Patricia L. Sweeney
Reviews.Content: I really like my new Kindle and would give it 5 stars except the battery will not fully charge. I have not had the time to try tech support so they may be able to help me with the issue. Even with a smaller than normal battery we have fully enjoyed the Kindle and plan to purchase more in future.

Reviews.Title: very nice
Reviews.Author: joe
Reviews.Content: bought this and happy, amazon customer service is the "bomb diggity" better than walmart,  believe me if this thing breaks even little while after warranty runs out thell fixit it happened to me with another kindle i bought a couple of years before this one .i even accidently downloaded prime couple of months before i bought this one on the old kindle they replaced  and they still allowed me to have prime on new one {"you only get one prime download a year"} like i said between customer service and the kindle fire hd speaks for itself  AWESOMEEEEE!!!!!! it s the bommmmmb

Reviews.Title: New Kindle Made Great Gift
Reviews.Author: Deeds
Reviews.Content: The new Kindle is everything we hoped for and I would recommend it to anyone. Now I can't get her attention.

Reviews.Title: Wouldn't charge.
Reviews.Author: William Walker
Reviews.Content: I bought Kindle Fire 8.9 as a Christmas present for my wife. I would not charge.,or hold charge. As soon as you removed power it would die. She was sent a repacement. it charged very slow. I got a charger for it and it works just fine now. I am very disapointed that Amazon would sell a product and not include a the charger with it that would recharge in the shortest amount of time.

Reviews.Title: This is my SECOND Kindle..........
Reviews.Author: Dusty
Reviews.Content: LOVE this puppy!!!! My 2 other tablets I own are cloudy compared to the KFHD. I was experiencing too many shutdowns with those 2. The Kindle Fire has not ever done that.  Also, I do not experience vision fatigue with the Kindle Fire. My other one is a 7".  The sound is awesome for music and listening to my music.Love Love it!.  Do not need the extra memory due to Online storage.  I purchased an open package/used.  Great price and in excellent condition. Could not tell the difference.The one and only tell tale that the unit was even used by someone else was a memory trail other owner as to her email and she liked Ebay?  I thought when one cleaned off it was all cleaned off.  I believe that is so for accessing on the specific unit, however the unit can still be recognized by other sites.  This is a great tip to NOT use extensively if not completely sold  on a tablet and are going to keep it.  Do not use for frequently visited websites.It is way lighter than my present tablets.  I Love it.......did I mention it is SO EASY on the EYES!!!

Reviews.Title: didn't work
Reviews.Author: anthony harvey
Reviews.Content: looked really forward to my new kindle, I have a 2nd gen. reader and use it every night. Ordered from Amazon but because I live in Sweden it was shipped from America. Arrived on time, looked stunning, plugged it in and, nothing wouldn't charge blank screen, dead.  Gutted, spoilt my day. Sent back to the states about three weeks ago, haven't heard a thing yet. No email, no apology no explanation. Enough said I think. Anthony Harvey, a disappointed customer

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Shelly
Reviews.Content: I love it, even though Amazon doesn't sell it anymore. I gave my old, little Fire to my mom to use for playing solitaire and upgraded to this one last year. Really nice screen and quite intuitive to use. People keep asking if it is an iPad. Uh, no. I tell them it's not that nice, but then add that it's perfect for me because I have a lot of Amazon content. I love how it integrates with the kindle book store and Audible and keeps my purchases for download. I seriously considered an iPad and read every tech and consumer review I saw and decided it wasn't worth the money. This little baby is. I am extremely pleased. The new HDX 8.9 is really tempting and I wouldn't hesitate to buy it if I didn't have this one. But I will wait until Amazon has a little more to offer before I upgrade again.

Reviews.Title: Not easy to operate. very confusing. Cannot access help when needed.
Reviews.Author: ruth watts
Reviews.Content: Is not user friendly and keeps freezing up.  Touching pad for accessing items does not always work.  Hav e to keep pressing.

Reviews.Title: It's a life saver...
Reviews.Author: Eric Allman
Reviews.Content: I'm going to be spending a lot of time in the Hospital in the next several months and the Hospital has Wi-Fi. I can still check my e-mail (g-mail app), communicate with family (Skype app) and pay my bills. I love my Kindle Fire HD. I recommend it to everyone.

Reviews.Title: It's great!
Reviews.Author: rosemarie o'neill
Reviews.Content: At first I had to get used to the size, I really did like the original.  Once I started using it after updating my computer router, I have been using it at home.  It kept all the information that was on my smaller kindle and I appreciated all the books I still have to read.  So far, everything is working properly and the charger fits snug into the book.  Very Nice!!!!  I highly recommend this Kindle for everyone!

Reviews.Title: Love it, Love it Love it.
Reviews.Author: mkzimmerman
Reviews.Content: Did my research and the best bang for the buck.  Christmas gift for my husband & he, loves it, loves it, loves it.

Reviews.Title: Great, I would n't know there was ever anything wrong.
Reviews.Author: Danielle A. Madison
Reviews.Content: So far I have had this for 6 months.  I have never had a problem with it and it came with a 1 year warrenty which was the same as buying a new one but for about $100 less.

Reviews.Title: love it!
Reviews.Author: KIMBERLY J MEADOR
Reviews.Content: Love this tablet!  Received this for Christmas, very happy with this product. Keeps a good charge as well, with clear picture and sound.

Reviews.Title: Kindle fire hd 8.9
Reviews.Author: punxyhunter
Reviews.Content: My wife really enjoys the kindle fire hd. 8.9 and it really is an excellant size .We bought one last year and bought two more for gifts this Christmas. Don't really know if the new model is better or not .

Reviews.Title: Don't buy refurbished!
Reviews.Author: Readzilla
Reviews.Content: I wouldn't even give it one star. It had a dead spot on the screen. I couldn't get my email set up. All my app icons looked exactly the same, like the amazon app. I couldn't tell the difference between Facebook or Twitter icons. I sent it back and paid the extra 30 bucks for the new one. I love it. My apps all loaded with the proper icons. My email set up perfectly.  And everything is so clear and crisp in HD. I won't buy refurbished anything in the future.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Kay Hanson
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my husband for Christmas.  It is his second Kindle.  He uses his reader all the time and will continue to use it for reading books.  He wanted something he could use more for checking email and getting online.  He let's me play games on it too!

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: BARBARA DANIELS
Reviews.Content: I would recommend this tablet to all who are interested in tablets.. THIS ONE IS A WINNER !!!NO NEGATIVES HERE!!!

Reviews.Title: love my kindle fire,an exceptional good deal
Reviews.Author: al avery
Reviews.Content: excellant ,,my kindle is wonderful i love it have recommended it to everyone ..what a deal....easy to use ,screen clarity,can read a book,play a game.use facebook ect...does everything my computer does

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Jack knies
Reviews.Content: gave as a gift, wife cant put it down,  may get another one for my self if the price drops

Reviews.Title: answer to question
Reviews.Author: robert  martin
Reviews.Content: I had to replace first unit. sent back to amazon. sent different one,but I was unable to learn whether it was new. this concerns me. I do not want a refurbished one. please help me with answer.

Reviews.Title: Think carefully before buying the HD 8.9"
Reviews.Author: kherron
Reviews.Content: Unless you have a membership to Prime, or if you subscribe to Netflix or Hulu, don't expect to watch much video on this.  Flash is NOT supported on this particular device, and you cannot side-load it.  Well, you can side-load it, but it will not function.  So don't bother trying.I wanted an inexpensive, large-screen tablet that would allow me to watch anything on You Tube, a live-stream of one of my local news stations, and view the magazines to which I subscribe in digital form...all without paying any monthly fees, or even one-time fees.  I thought this tablet was for me.Well, there is no real app for You Tube, so that's out. If you go to You Tube's website, you can't watch anything because, like I wrote, Flash is not supported on this device.  (It is supported on some other Kindles, but NOT the HD 8.9")  And, I could not watch a live-stream of my favorite local news because, again, no Flash!  (Adobe's problem, not Kindle!  Shame on them!)I found some of my magazines (for free) in their digital form, because I'm already a print subscriber, they were free.  Most of the other magazines were viewable IF I paid for a year's digital subscription. No thanks. I'm not paying twice.Since this Kindle device doesn't support all Android apps, there is a chance may apps you may have on your Droid or IOS phone will NOT be available on the Kindle...so make SURE that this will do what you want it to do before you buy it.  Seemed like there were a lot of "silly" apps and lots of games. If that's what you like, then you will probably like this tablet.  Or if you're into books, you may find what you're looking for.  (I'm not a big reader, so I didn't investigate books available)Lesson-learned for me...I should have checked into it all a lot more.  Once my return goes through, I'm just going to spend a few extra bucks and get the iPad!One positive, this Kindle has a gorgeous HD display...loved the color and clarity.  It was pretty light-weight and found it pretty easy to use/navigate.

Reviews.Title: The most amazing thing EVER!
Reviews.Author: Natalee Goehrig
Reviews.Content: I am LOVING my new Kiindle Fire! This is clearly what my life has been missing:) I love books and movies and this lets me indulge in both of those as much as my life will allow! Definatley become a prime memeber as this allows you to stream movies and borrow one book a month which doesn't seem like a lot but it is truly amazing! My father has the apple ipad and he's heard how much I love my Kindle so much he's going to get one and dump the ipad! This totally rocks!

Reviews.Title: Upgrade from Kindle 7 inch
Reviews.Author: G. Waldron
Reviews.Content: OMG! There aren't enough words to describe how happy I am with my purchase! The price I paid made it even more special. I've been a Kindle owner since 2011. Wouldn't have any other e-reader/tablet!!

Reviews.Title: Made my mom cry!
Reviews.Author: janet helferstay
Reviews.Content: My mom was not expecting a Kindle for Christmas and she cried tears of joy when she opened it. She loved it. The only thing I was disappointed with is I did not know I needed to order the charging adapter. The charging adapter should come with the Kindle. But otherwise very happy with it.

Reviews.Title: Kindle FIre HD 8.9, 64 GB
Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: This Kindle is actually pretty good. Fast connection to Internet, good screen quality, only thing I have aproblems with is the sound. the sound is clear but it is not loud enough. There should be a slot for a SD Card even though kindle cloud is available the need for a SD card is still there. Transferring documrents, pictures, vidoes etc .... the new Kindle does not have a SD slot either. In my opinion this is a big mistake on kindles part. cloud is a excellent storage place but youstill need a SD Card slot.... yes youcan use blue tooth but it takes so long to transferr items.

Reviews.Title: worth the money
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I like the kindle and this is my 4th one. Only had one go up on me. A great buy

Reviews.Title: Great except for battery life
Reviews.Author: Denise C.
Reviews.Content: This is the 4th Kindle I've purchased and I've had this model for approximately 5 months now.  I have seen reviews about how the battery life is not great on the Kindle fire HD 8.9" but thought I would take my chances as I wanted the bigger screen to watch movies. Like other reviewers, the battery did hold a good charge for the first couple of months, but the last few months I have been disappointed how quickly the battery depletes with minimal internet use.  With a fully charged battery I can get thru a 2 hour movie, but it will be close to empty.  When reading books, the battery seems to do better but  after reading a few hours, it will still go down 15-20%.  If you don't mind charging this model daily, then this is a great deal and the overall features and Prime benefits are well worth this inconvenience.  I don't have battery issues on the smaller Kindle fire HD 7"  which my kids use or the older Kindle keyboard.

Reviews.Title: Great gadget
Reviews.Author: carmen
Reviews.Content: I am a prime member and I can watch a lot of movies and tv shows for free wherever there is a wifi connection, also it makes navigating the web on the go super easy and evem better with the larger display

Reviews.Title: freezes
Reviews.Author: Debra Factor
Reviews.Content: the web browser freezes and is horrible.  I don't know if I can change the browser or not, but silk is terrible.

Reviews.Title: kindle fire HD
Reviews.Author: Helen Weddle
Reviews.Content: Love it and the service has been great .Would consider getting another if anything would go wrong  to this one

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD
Reviews.Author: BigBob
Reviews.Content: The Kindle Fire was just as described. It is just another reason that I will continue to deal with Amazon on any other purpose and I will certainly not hesitate to recommend them to my friends and family.The delivery was excellent. Keep up your good work!

Reviews.Title: best purchase in a long time
Reviews.Author: gcg
Reviews.Content: No disappointment here.  Everything I expected and then some. From books, media, games a nd movies; Kindle 's got you covered.

Reviews.Title: quality product
Reviews.Author: valon12
Reviews.Content: Larger tablet makes it easy to view and use at a great price. Color and screen outstanding it is truly a no brainer.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Deborah V Solomon
Reviews.Content: I am still getting used to this.  But am pretty sure I am going to love it.  It's a great size.

Reviews.Title: In love!
Reviews.Author: Claryvette Garcia
Reviews.Content: Well I just got mines (8.9 HD) and I have to tell you I am in LOVE! The picture looks great, it's pretty responsive and download time is awesome. I also got a free MP3 song, a free book and a free comic.Thanks Amazon! Only thing I would change is for them to INCLUDE the wall charger for faster charging. I think it's a rip off for you guys to charge an extra $20 for something that should be included with every electronic.

Reviews.Title: Better than Apple of it performance easy to use
Reviews.Author: Brownbats
Reviews.Content: I really enjoy this Kindle HD Fire 8.9 very much with no problems. Easy to use & fast as lighting. I gave my another Kindle HD 7"' to my daughter. She tells me that my Kindle HD Fire 8.9 is better than Apple because of it's performance & wieight.

Reviews.Title: Love it!!
Reviews.Author: Nicole Garrett
Reviews.Content: I love the Kindle Fire HD 8.9. I have used a iPad before as far as I am concerned Kindle is way better!!!

Reviews.Title: Great device
Reviews.Author: Sharon C "Sharon C"
Reviews.Content: The Kindle Fire exceeded my expectations. I have an iPad, so I was curious how it would compare. The screen resolution on the Kindle Fire is gorgeous, with rich and beautiful color saturation that equals the iPad. The sound is much better than the iPad! I was watching a movie on the Kindle and I was surprised by how full the sound was! I much prefer reading on the Kindle as it is lighter and the screen doesn't have a glare at all. I still use my iPad for many things, but the Kindle is my go-to device for reading and a couple of other things.

Reviews.Title: Like the I pad mini
Reviews.Author: Perky
Reviews.Content: This is as good as my I pad mini. It does everything that the iPad does. Everything is very sharp and bright,I have to say that I do like the regular kindle fire for reading much better. I also liked the smaller size than the new one.All in all it is very good.

Reviews.Title: Hard time with it
Reviews.Author: darcell sanford
Reviews.Content: I'm not sure if an antivirus came with it, but I'm having problems after a few months with internet connection.  When I looked on line for an antivirus for kindle, one came up for $199.  I would suggest getting a tablet the same size with a USB (this doesn't have one) port and downloading the kindle app.  It works just as well, you can get all the books and you are not restricted in your use of it.  If you want it just for books, then get the cheaper kindle or another reading device.  If you expect it to work like a Microsoft tablet or Ipad, you will be disappointed.  Somewhere down the line I clicked on Prime when ordering a book and didn't know it until I went to order something else.  I wasn't sure how long I had the free trial, so I hurried up and cancelled it before I was charged so I never got to experience how Amazon Prime work so that set me back.

Reviews.Title: good quality picture, good size screen, great customer service
Reviews.Author: C. Rainone "BOOKS R US"
Reviews.Content: Didn't feel the need to get the HDX, and I was right. Picture is great. Glad I went with this larger size as opposed to the 7 inch, because we got the keyboard as well for the kids' homework. 7 inch would be too small. The first Kindle that was sent had a defective charging connection, but Amazon is great with returns, no hassles whatsoever. Called on December 26th, got a replacement by Dec. 31. I'm glad I didn't take advantage of the "Special Offers" price, because we have not had any pop-up ads, which I had seen from previous reviews could be inappropriate for children. Perhaps I haven't figured it out yet, but I wish the parental control would also limit what types of books, movies are listed for purchase. Some of the covers, titles are terribly inappropriate for children. We were browsing Christmas titles, only to find some books with scantily clad men or women with Santa hats on…hardly Christmas in the true sense of the word. For now, Mommy surfs the titles with the kids.

Reviews.Title: Freezes up constantly
Reviews.Author: Mark Hannon
Reviews.Content: Sound and picture quality are great, but this Kindle keeps freezing up.  Sometimes, the keyboard will not go away, and that of course is a pain when trying to scroll through a web page.  Other times, the keyboard won't come up at all.  As if that wasn't bad enough, The screen will randomly freeze up and won't let you turn off the Kindle to reset it.  This was a gift for my girlfriend (she now has the original Kindle Fire and this 8.9 inch one) and this newer one is more of a pain than the older 7 inch one.  I bought her this refurbished one for Christmas due to its larger screen, 64 Gigs of memory, and better WiFi.  Unfortunately, her 7 inch, 8 Gig, original Kindle Fire seems to have less issues than this one.  I am dissapointed considering how much I paid for it.

Reviews.Title: Great for all members of our family
Reviews.Author: Beluga13 "Jennifer"
Reviews.Content: All of us use the kindle for different things-- reading books of course, but also playing games (my husband), watching kids shows via netflix (my young daughter). It's easy enough to use too. I'd recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Upgrade
Reviews.Author: c
Reviews.Content: :) My Daughter was very happy with this Gift...( esp. the size of the screen ) she takes it everywhere with her!.

Reviews.Title: No charger. No instruction.
Reviews.Author: Danlami Ali
Reviews.Content: The kindle was for a gift. It did not come with a charger and instruction. I had to purchase one separately. It should at least come with getting started instruction.

Reviews.Title: This is a great product
Reviews.Author: Alex
Reviews.Content: This is a great product sold at a very reasonable price, i would highly recommend purchasing this product from Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Love my second Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: Joyce M Johnson
Reviews.Content: I love the way I stay connected with the Kindle Fire HD. I can connect with my e-mail and facebook as well as with my bank. Movies are so clear and vivid and the bigger page for the books I read is great.

Reviews.Title: Love It!
Reviews.Author: Ree-Ree
Reviews.Content: This was a birthday gift from my daughter.  I was and am more than thrilled.  I have owned the Kindle 2nd generation for about 7 years.  This Fire HD was something on my wish list for a while.  My only complaint (not a big one) is since I use it so much; it has to be charged almost daily.

Reviews.Title: birthday present from my husband
Reviews.Author: Cheri Simpson
Reviews.Content: I love, love, love it.  The only thing that I am disappointed with is the quality of the pictures.  I am on it all the time.  Best gift ever.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD 8.9", Dolby Audio, Dual-Band Wi-Fi, 16 GB -
Reviews.Author: frankazin
Reviews.Content: A fabulous unit!  You will love every feature that the Kindle Fire has and it has a lot of features, apps and functions.  Also there are a multitude of free or low-cost books, music and movies that you can download.  I LOVE Mine!

Reviews.Title: I'm new to tablets but this one is very easy to use
Reviews.Author: Daisy A. Taylor
Reviews.Content: I like the Wi-Fi feature.  The Kindle is small and light enough to be portable but the screen is large and clear enough to read, watch TV/movies or play games easily.  I'm a senior citizen and new to this technology but am finding it easy to use and the help feature really assists me in this regard.

Reviews.Title: Good reader, questionable e-mail resource
Reviews.Author: Bruce Langager
Reviews.Content: I have gone through three Kindle Fires in a period of about years,  The first, a 7" Kindle fire, died after about a year when I tried to re-register it in my wife's name, The second, a Kindle Fire HD 8.9," kept dropping my wireless connection and it was replaced under warranty with a new Kindle Fire HD 8.9" eleven months after I purchased it.  All three of the Kindle Fire tablets that I have had experience with have proven to be very unstable in maintaining wireless internet connections and proved to be very slow in handling e-mails.  Comparing the performance of the three Kindle Fires to my wife's iPad ability to maintain stable wireless connections and the speed of handling e-mail communications, I would rate the Kindle Fire HD's as a very distant second.  After the warranty replacement tablet's performance in handling e-mails decayed to the poor performance level of my first 8.9" tablet in just six weeks I replaced the Kindle Fire HD 8.9" with an iPad.

Reviews.Title: Very Disappointed
Reviews.Author: Britt
Reviews.Content: I am really beginning to hate the Kindle Fire HD.  This is the second Kindle I have had since June.  I think this second Kindle Fire HD has more problems than the first one.  The apps are the main issue with this Kindle.  The company does not have a browser to support the Kindles at all so I had to go to a third party site to find one.  I found one which is the dolphin browser, however, this browser freezes the Kindle.  So until I figure out what tablet I want, I just use this Kindle Fire HD to read and check my emails.  Watching videos is useless.  If the apps do not work, you loose your money on them.  Amazon is known to cheat on some of these purchases.  If anybody knows a good tablet let me know please.  I love to read and do other things as well.

Reviews.Title: kindle fire is great
Reviews.Author: Doris
Reviews.Content: this one is larger than my old one so I can see items clearer.....definitely suggest purchasing this one rather than the 7" one.  Enjoy.

Reviews.Title: Versible and Light Weight
Reviews.Author: David L. Long
Reviews.Content: The Kindle Fire is everything I expected.  My main use is for reading however it is great to quickly search the internet on subjects that interest me.

Reviews.Title: #love it!
Reviews.Author: jogigo
Reviews.Content: This was a gift for my wife and we both agree, that it is everything it was advertised as being.  User friendly; great picture, best size, In my opinion.  I have a 7 inch tablet and I find prolonged reading or looking at it tiring to my eyes.  Definitely would buy another one.

Reviews.Title: kindle fire hd 8.9
Reviews.Author: Marcy
Reviews.Content: One of the main reasons I wanted this HD was that it would be bigger,better,faster than the kindle fire. I wanted to see more on a bigger screen. To my surprise, I went to one of my websites and found I couldn't access several of my options after logging in...like "my profile,wishlist,or order history"....which were critical.  I kept getting the error message "there are too many redirects" .  Silk is the default browser on the kindles. I did not have this error on my first kindle fire.  ln order for me to be able to view those options I needed...I had to download a separate browser to the HD that would allow me to access those options.I like the size of the HD. Would I recommend this to everyone-yes. As long as they're aware of the above mentioned problem with silk. I hope the creators of the HD can resolve the problem of "there are to many redirects"....with an update to the HD operating system or software.

Reviews.Title: no problems
Reviews.Author: Jennifer Rosenstadt
Reviews.Content: I have enjoyed my Kindle, and have not had any problems with it at all. I would recommend the certified refurbished to others.

Reviews.Title: kindle fire 8.9 h.d.
Reviews.Author: Annie Beaudry
Reviews.Content: I love my new kindle HD 8 .9 I just wish it were possible to take pictures with. That it had a photo lens on both sides of the device instead of just the front. It is one of the  reasons why I chose this one.

Reviews.Title: kindle fire 8.9
Reviews.Author: Dave W.
Reviews.Content: Fast easy access to web sites and e-mail.Easy to use and good battery life.Can be used by all my family members.

Reviews.Title: My one and only tablet
Reviews.Author: Shanna Kinser
Reviews.Content: I purchased this Kindle Fire HD 8.9 as an early Christmas gift to myself. I am so thrilled with all features. This e-reader/tablet suits my wants and needs perfectly. Seemless transfer of my Kindle e books, impressive web surfing speed, excellent streaming of television and movies, great price compared to Apple. Couldn't be happier. Also purchased the turbo charger. Works great. Thank you Amazon. Excellent product, excellent price.

Reviews.Title: My review of the Kindle Fire HD 8.9
Reviews.Author: Benjamin Seabrook Tremain
Reviews.Content: Its my opinon the Kindle Fire HD 8.9 while it has some good things going for it like being associated with Amazon.com's digital content of example, that from my own personal experince its not exactly the tablet to think of when you want to load and run programs and apps at lightning quick speeds. I'd consider the Kindle Fire HD 8.9 more for the the casual tech enthusist who dosen't mind taking some extra time to do whatever it is they may want to do with it, even if most all they may ever feel like doing with it may rarely go beyond watching some movies on it or just listening to some music. Lucky for them the screen of the Kindle Fire HD accomodates the playback of digital imagery excellently.

Reviews.Title: First Tablet Purchase
Reviews.Author: Judge Neil M. Travis
Reviews.Content: I choose the Kindle Fire HD 8.9" because it had a large screen, it was Wi-Fi compatible, and it was sold by Amazon. This was my first tablet purchase and my first experience with this type of technology. [I don't own a "Smart Phone] To date I have been pleased with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Refurbished Kindle Fire HD 8.9" worth the money
Reviews.Author: Cynthia Scherlitz "wolf lady 54"
Reviews.Content: I gave this a 5 star rating because I have never had any trouble with amazon products so far. The cost and warranty for a 8.9" wi-fi, 32 GB system is more than I needed and exactly what I was wanting.  I have had other kindles and they have also been refurbished and have had no problems.  I take this fire with me everywhere and can pay bills, watch movies or read.  What more would you want.

Reviews.Title: GREAT AS I LEARN TO USE IT.
Reviews.Author: RUTHANN  SOKOL
Reviews.Content: I LIKE THE THINGS I HAVE ALREADY LEARNED TO DO ON IT. AND AS AMAZON WALKS ME THRU INSTRUCTIONS ON USING IT, IT IS EASY TO USE.  I STILL HAVE AWAYS TO GO BUT AM TAKING IT SLOW MYSELF. NOT THEM. I HAVE ALREADY TALKED TO THREE DIFFERENT FAMILY MEMBERS ABOUT GETTING ONE SO WE CAN SKYPE AND SEE EACH OTHER AS WE ALL LIVE IN DIFFERENT STATES.

Reviews.Title: OMG
Reviews.Author: donna meadows
Reviews.Content: I LOVE THIS I WISH I HAD THIS ONE MYSELF BUT IT IS A CHRISTMAS GIFT FOR MY DAUGHTER SHE WILL LOVE IT

Reviews.Title: Love Love Love
Reviews.Author: Donna
Reviews.Content: Was bummed when my first Kindle broke and I was not sure If I was going to get another kindle but When I was offered an upgrade at a great price made me love Amazon even more.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: It was everything we wanted.  Works great. Easy to use.  We were still using original kindle so this is nice

Reviews.Title: kindle fire hd 8.9
Reviews.Author: Nancy Dreiling
Reviews.Content: Speed in performance. Larger size. Easier to read. More apps available.it was a gift - I had a kindle fire 7 that cracked but still worked good.

Reviews.Title: surprise gift
Reviews.Author: rondee
Reviews.Content: Yes, this is what I wanted, gave to someone special and she loves it. She is just staring to get use to it, but can reach everyone with a touch . And enjoys it tremendously, great purchase, I am truly satisfied.

Reviews.Title: Chromecast- HBOGO
Reviews.Author: Katy Snyder
Reviews.Content: I wish the Chromecast with HBO Go was developed  but as of right now but it isn't.  That's really the only gripe for now.

Reviews.Title: Not Happy
Reviews.Author: Cynthia Ann Basile
Reviews.Content: I bought a Kindle Fire( small tablet ) about 2 years ago. I liked it at first, until it was stolen at the school that I work at. Debated, & bought a second one. That one wouldn't charge within the first 3 months. Luckily, under warranty, it was replaced. This one was fine until 3 months after the warranty ran out. Complained to Amazon, & they gave me a small deal on this one, the 8.9 Kindle Fire. Luckily it's still under warranty, because this one doesn't load right, can't turn off or on sometimes, & I couldn't find a case or screen to fit it! Needs a lot of perfecting in my opinion.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet
Reviews.Author: Alya
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my mom who wanted her first tablet. She loves it and uses it constantly to read, study and play mind challenging games. She rarely uses media and web features and likes the size of this tablet.Comparing this to the iPad mini with retina, it is frustratingly slow, missing many useful features in the reader forcing downloads of pdf and book readers, and the user interface is clunky and limiting. However, that is an unfair comparison (like comparing apples to homemade apple pie a la mode), since the mini is twice the price.I like the Kindle free time feature for kids and I did subscribe to the unlimited version for the free trial but there were too many choices for toddlers to cope with and I didn't find the subscription necessary at this time.This version of the Kindle is well worth it's price and fun for the oldest and youngest members of the household.

Reviews.Title: The Kindle Fire HD is just what the Doctor ordered for someone that wants to get on the internet and Rent Books Free
Reviews.Author: DukesDad
Reviews.Content: I purchased the Kindle Fire HD for my wife who is an Avid reader and she uses it every day.  Renting books from your library over line is as easy as can be.  I believe this is one of my favorite purchases from Amazon.  The item came quickly, packed very well and made my special someone very happy.  Thank You Amazon for helping me out.

Reviews.Title: Love my new Kindle 8.9 4g
Reviews.Author: Happy
Reviews.Content: Really love my new kindle. There jis nothing better for email and online shopping. Customer service is also great. It is so easy to get any inquiries answeres at any time day or night

Reviews.Title: Excellent. Love it!
Reviews.Author: daybyday "atkinsPro"
Reviews.Content: I LOVE this Kindle FIRE. I am on it more than my laptop. It was so easy to take on a trip. Used it on the plane. Fit in my big purse as a personal carry on. I don't have to lug around a huge,heavy laptop while traveling anymore. This does everything I need it to do.

Reviews.Title: The best Christmas present ever!
Reviews.Author: Christina Callaghan
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love my kindle! I had to return the first two I got but the customer service was excellent and I my replacement kindles arrived in a few quick days both times. I've read a few books a week on average for the last year and love being able to change to the font size and lighting as needed so its easier on my eyes.

Reviews.Title: Solid build but not enough content.
Reviews.Author: Kosar Bishop
Reviews.Content: My Kindle Fire HDX 8.9" arrived this week and while the build quality is excellent it is quite lacking in the software. I know amazon wants to push their own app store but not including google play store is just wrong. Until google play support is announced its little more than an amazon video player with your basic apps.

Reviews.Title: Kindle fire hd 8.9" meets expectations
Reviews.Author: Lynette Nelson
Reviews.Content: Great tablet for the price.  Like the bigger screen.  The only thing missing is it didn't come with a charger, which I thought was odd.

Reviews.Title: Love the device but Amazon can do better on pricing
Reviews.Author: E.Reed
Reviews.Content: Love the device but not amazon's 2013 pricing.  Since Black Friday you can find this device for $200 at many retailers but  Amazon has it for $40 more today than yesterday.  Why is Amazon the only place not discounting last year models.  I purchased 4 HD kindles in the past 2 weeks none from amazon.  In fact I have 2 other kindles neither purchased from Amazon.  I bought this model in a big box store (for much more as it was the newest at the time) b/c that store had it in stock on launch date and amazon had a delay of a week or so.  Love the kindles, typically love amazon, but not the two together.  You'd think Amazon would have the best prices around on their own product.

Reviews.Title: recommended
Reviews.Author: Merissa Linn
Reviews.Content: awesome. i read all the reviews off of consumers report and this came with great recommendations and you will enjoy it

Reviews.Title: I love my Kindle Fire HD
Reviews.Author: Rex B
Reviews.Content: I love my kindle fire HD. I use it every day without any real issues. One minor issue that I have noticed is that the wireless gets hung up sometimes and I have to turn the wireless setting off and back on for it to start working again. It's not really a big deal, just a minor annoyance. One other thing that I have noticed is that apps get hung up more often than on any of my Apple devices (which basically never get hung up). But, for the price I am totally happy to have the Kindle Fire over the iPad. I think the hardware is amazing, it just needs the operating system to catch up.

Reviews.Title: It's incredible fast, bright and very quick
Reviews.Author: Carmeta
Reviews.Content: I love it it's very easy to use, fast and quick I absolutely love it I would recomended to anyone

Reviews.Title: 10 stars hands down!!!
Reviews.Author: Megan Y.
Reviews.Content: It is 5 stars hands down!!! Brilliant masterminds finally came up with an innovative product and it's here, cheap, and better than ever!!! This is the best because you can listen to music, play games, and even read books!!! Plus you can even take pictures. No, it is not perfectly perfect but whenever you have a problem, chat is the best option and it is available 24/7... So get your kindle now!!! Yes, it does have a few flaws. For example, the camera isn't the best but you don't need to walk around Paris holding up a big tablet taking pictures,,, buy a camera!!! And yes it does take a while to charge. But just buy a power charger for $20 or less or what I do is let it just sit overnight and let it charge. Because your not going to use it 24/7 so just let it charge overnight and it will last the whole day I promise you (just turn off wifi when you don't use it and turn your brightness down)!!! Also there isn't a crazy selection for apps, but what is cool is the fact that you can get apps to enhance your kindle and you don't even have to spend money!!! Just use your 500 coins... that is what I do!!! So get GSam Battery pack that is really cool to add a neat icon and get a volume control app to add a volume bar to your kindle so you don't even have to swipe down to turn down your volume, just turn it down or up from the icon button. The volume control app is free... so buy it no to enhance your kindle. Plus, you can get an app that lets you add a background... YES IT'S HERE!!! So what are you waiting for it is cheap and everything that you want... so bye and go buy YOUR KINDLE FIRE HD(X) TODAY!!!

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD
Reviews.Author: ann swanson
Reviews.Content: The best thing I ever bought for my personal entertainment.Great  clear picture and love the white on black screen for reading late at night without disturbing anyone with bright lights

Reviews.Title: Didn't expect to love it, but I do
Reviews.Author: anonymousreader26
Reviews.Content: I already own an original Kindle, and decided to buy the Fire HD 8.9" primarily with the idea of using it to read magazines. I have seen and used an earlier generation Kindle Fire and didn't think much of it, but WOW -- I am very impressed with the HD 8.9". It looks beautiful, the sound quality is excellent (aside from keyboard sounds being so faint that I can hardly hear them), the web browser is quick... and yes, the magazines I've tried so far were good-looking and easy to read. It's even fun to look at the ads in a magazine like Vanity Fair because I feel like I'm flipping through a real (non electronic) glossy magazine. Although I'm keeping my original Kindle for reading books because I prefer e-ink, I can envision this device partly replacing my iPhone, which has become difficult for me to see/read after the ios7 update. Amazon has an amazing product here!

Reviews.Title: Wonderful customer support and a great solid product
Reviews.Author: Jackie Brown
Reviews.Content: My son loves his kindle. The one we purchased came with pressure marks at the bottom of the screen. I contacted Amazon's support and they sent me a quick replacement. Wonderful customer support and a great solid product.

Reviews.Title: daughter's family gives it 5 stars
Reviews.Author: mainer
Reviews.Content: Bought as gift for my husband. He didn't use it much as he is technologically challenged but our daughter borrowed it and it hasn't been returned and her whole family now wants one so I would say that is a 5 star rating.

Reviews.Title: Love It
Reviews.Author: John
Reviews.Content: This is my 2nd Kindle.  This is by far the best,  I have been plugging it into my TV to watch free movies.  I am a Prime Member and it provides many benefits.  The movies are great quality on the TV.  I really like this one and I believe that you will to.  Be sure to read the Spec before buying to make sure it has the Micro HDMI input plug. If you have the Smart HD TV it does not matter which model you buy because you can transmit to the TV by WiFi.

Reviews.Title: Terrific tablet for the money.
Reviews.Author: Mr. CHL
Reviews.Content: I have so much enjoyed this tablet with it's many apps and e-mail and some truly fun games, most of them free. I did invest in the mini HDMI cable and it works terrific!  I watch movies on my big screen in full hd and Dolby stereo. For the price and what it  does I view this as a worthwhile purchase. Alas, as I write this the DX model has been released and I will be compelled to not only investigate the product but will end up buying it! Hey Amazon, how about as trade in???

Reviews.Title: Great Kindle!
Reviews.Author: Betty S.
Reviews.Content: Love my kindle fire. Like this the larger screen. Bought the smaller one before this and was easy to use, easy to read and easy to set up so I decided to give that one to my husband and I got the larger one because of my eyes. Works great and love it and would recommend it for the good price. Does everything the larger priced items do, but you can afford this. Tech support is great also.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Gale Hawkins
Reviews.Content: Easy for me to operate. And large enough to see everything. And, I can do most everything on it as I can on my computer.

Reviews.Title: Love My Kindle Fire HD
Reviews.Author: christiane lasley
Reviews.Content: It does everything that I wanted it to .I want to buy my 3 grandkids one . They use mine all the time. every one should have one of these. so easy to use. I keep the Kindle with me at all times, it fits in my purse and goes where I go. I use it in waiting rooms, I read in the car, I use it in hotels, take it on vacations. I Love My Kindle Fire HD 8.9

Reviews.Title: Good reader and light surfing
Reviews.Author: Benutzer
Reviews.Content: Does everything well except websites that require flash. Gave this to my wife and inherited her original Fire. I can watch German and Austrian TV via the web, she can't.  Pulls in WLAN as good as any tablet or phone we have had

Reviews.Title: Like NEW and Does it All
Reviews.Author: Alan Kunz
Reviews.Content: I can't believe anyone ever owned or used my Kindle Fire HD before me.  It is as new and does everything I want it to.

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet. Fantastic screen. A bit heavy.
Reviews.Author: William B. Gavin
Reviews.Content: This was my first Kindle. It works very well. It just takes some time learning how to utilize all the features. Finally purchased a couple of books to help out. I think they should have included a comprehensive user manual.The clarity of the display is more than awesome. I use it mostly for reading books and thought I should have purchased the Paperwhite model, but I was wrong. It text is absolutely crystal clear.The only negative is that it is a bit heavier than I thought it would be.

Reviews.Title: Not recomended for anyone who is not technosavvy
Reviews.Author: PHILLIP HURNI
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my elderly father who doesn't see very well.  He likes to read publications like the Wall Street Journal and i thought the font could be enlarged to make it easier for him to read.  but teh Kindle would not do that or at least i couldn't figure out how to enlrge it enough for to make it usable.  If i can't figure it out then my elderly father who is not technsavvy is never going to figure it out.  I love the device and its capabiltiies but i would not recommmned it for someone who is not technology-capable.

Reviews.Title: Exceeded expectations!
Reviews.Author: ct_djr
Reviews.Content: This is one of my favorite all-time 'gifts-for-self'. Not sure what could make it better. HD resolution and sound are great. Make sure you get an HDMI output cable to jack it into any big TV for sharing movies and pictures with friends.  I bought it just to have a "reader" for publications, but got sooo much more. Internet access via Silk works fine. I use it for much more than expected, and am finding new ways to do more every day.

Reviews.Title: Best choice I could've made
Reviews.Author: W.C.Frenelle
Reviews.Content: Had this for about a month now.  Traded in an Asus 10.1 Transformer.  Fire better meets my entertainment needs while still letting me do basic business needs.  Use Prime slot and my wife loves the streaming content, especially when viewed via the hdmi output to our large screen Samsung.  Onboard viewing is superb and the sound is amazing!

Reviews.Title: Great device
Reviews.Author: RICK MEREDITH
Reviews.Content: This is a great device I'm really impressed with it!  I have iPads I'm using iPad mini to Write this review on this. But I like the books, I like the features on it! it is a very good device at a reasonable price!

Reviews.Title: good buy
Reviews.Author: ooh well
Reviews.Content: I purchased this for my wife and she loves it, keeps me in good standing from getting yelled at, she can access the internet very easily

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Jennifer
Reviews.Content: I bought the Kindle Fire HD because I wanted a tablet, and college students aren't known for having a lot of money to spend. I'm pleased with the performance, and the apps that are available. I can't count the times I've used my Kindle for reading/writing for school, to email files to my Kindle, reading for pleasure, looked up something using Silk, the browser. It's an all around great tablet and wasn't terribly pricey; the other 3 people in my house have also invested in the Kindle Fire HD :)

Reviews.Title: Don't fear buying a refurb
Reviews.Author: Inglenook
Reviews.Content: Am enjoying my Kindle Fire HD. Have had no problems. Screen is sharp and colors are great. Great deal! Usually stay away from refurb. This has been a positive experience.

Reviews.Title: silk browser stinks
Reviews.Author: tina
Reviews.Content: Silk web browser  freezes every time I try to do somethin on the web weather browsing or trying to purchase something. It also kicks me out of the internet.  I do like the devise itself  tho.

Reviews.Title: HOOKED ON KINDLE FIRE HD
Reviews.Author: Donna Tartaglia
Reviews.Content: This is my THIRD Kindle Fire; I upgraded to KF HD 8.9".  Everything is just fabulous about this product. Would recommend or buy as a gift for anyone.I AM HOOKED!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD 8.9
Reviews.Author: NorthernEyes
Reviews.Content: I LOVE my Kindle Fire HD 8.9! I have had it for 2 weeks now and no complaints. My previous eReader was a Kindle Keyboard. The Kindle Keyboard worked fine for reading, but having a dark screen proved to be difficult in some situations so I wanted a new Kindle that didn't have a dark screen. I also wanted the screen to be much larger so I could watch Netflix. I'm so glad I bought the Kindle Fire HD 8.9! Beautiful HD screen, great audio quality, and great features.

Reviews.Title: Go Kindle Fire and Amazon!
Reviews.Author: DejaView "LauDenMac"
Reviews.Content: This my 7th Kindle. My husband has tried two other brands, then tried mine. He's now a Kindle Fire convert... LOL. Smart man!!

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT!!!!!
Reviews.Author: SimplySassy
Reviews.Content: I loved my first Kindle Fire but this one is WAY better! I LOVE IT! its great! the screen is a great size. The quality is awsome. The wi fi is great. Mucha better than my last Kindle Fire. My games look awsome on it. I use it almost for nothing but games. Its GREAT!

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD
Reviews.Author: Jack Mobes
Reviews.Content: I love my kindle, I use it constantly.  The only complaint I have, you don't have plug ins to view online videos and there is no way to download them, unless you use dolphin browser.  Most of my online classes you need plugins, so initially it was frustrating.  I wish Amazon would fix this issue.

Reviews.Title: misleading as to what can be viewed on TV/Movies
Reviews.Author: DW
Reviews.Content: Advertised as being able to view tv / movies on device by downloading appropriate Apps. But doesn't work with Xfinity Comcast programs/movies. VERY disappointed with this device.

Reviews.Title: Replacement Kindle 8.9"
Reviews.Author: david puntenney
Reviews.Content: It only lasted 7 months before it froze up (went into safe mode). Amazon was fast on sending me another one (that was used) and seems to be a lot slower in everything thing it does compared to the new one I originally got. Also not very happy that all info that had been entered into the first one was all lost. Very disapointed

Reviews.Title: Certified refurbished Kindle Fire devices are a smart shopping choice.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I like te unit. it works great. Just disappointed in loss o some capability regarding kindle ebook management. I also have a kindle touch and i offeres ability to classify ebooks it categories that I establish so I can easily maage my ebooks and quickly find whaI am looking for.  THis is not offered on Fire devise.  This is a poor programming choice.  I do like the sze of th 8.9' Fie device.  I see no difference in tis unit vs a new unit. I would higly suggest buyers consider the refurbishd devices as a cost saving option. Better price for same look, feel and capability.. I suggesty buyers take the dollars saved an buy a marware protective cover.  We have 5 Kindes and we keep them all very safe using these great protective cover

Reviews.Title: Good hardware but software needs improvements
Reviews.Author: A. Refaat "AR"
Reviews.Content: The hardware is excellent, maybe a little bit heavy but the screen and sound quality are great, 8.9" is the perfect screen size. However the app store is missing a lot of popular apps like dropbox and firefox , also the UI needs to be more personalized and support more languages. Other than that good product and great price.

Reviews.Title: Function Buttons
Reviews.Author: Henry R. Prentiss "Hank"
Reviews.Content: Nice, but function buttons difficult to access. Design  engineering should be able to come up with a better means of getting to the controls.

Reviews.Title: Not as good as an ipad
Reviews.Author: Alberto Gonzalez
Reviews.Content: Bought it for my mother, but returned it because it is not  as simple to use as an ipad. Also, skype is horrible when compared to facetime. It does not have a forward facing camera and my mother didn't appreciate that.

Reviews.Title: Silk Browser Extremely Frustrating
Reviews.Author: Dorothy L
Reviews.Content: Have had this model for a year now and I am so frustrated with the Silk browser freezing up all the time, at least 3+ times a day.  Rebooting doesn't help.  Also it can't keep a charge.  The 4G wireless was a waste of money as well.  Extremely disappointed and I definitely don't recommend this model to anyone, except maybe one's worst enemy.

Reviews.Title: Good tablet but not for me
Reviews.Author: Siawilin
Reviews.Content: It just isn't what I want or need-too heavy, mainly. If I had it to do over, I'd go with an iPad. Sad to be waiting for my new Kindle Fire to die, so that I can get something else, when I have only had it for less than a week, but that is where I'm at with it. It works fine, just doesn't meet my needs. An iPad, of about the same weight would have twice the screen size. This is what comes from buying online, instead of in a store. Not Amazon's fault, they have been amazing.

Reviews.Title: Great for this price compare tto other Android tablet
Reviews.Author: Dr.Poonchai Chitanuntavitaya
Reviews.Content: This is a great screen with right weight,  battery is good (Turn wifi off) But web browser is a bit delay.

Reviews.Title: Thumbs Up
Reviews.Author: Nonsha
Reviews.Content: Love my kindle. Reading, games, movies, and TV.
