There are things however I don't like, the battery doesn't last long enough if your constantly on it. :-)  4 or 5 hrs depending on what you are doing. And to charge it you better buy Amazons power charger, or it will take forever to charge. Also there is no USB interface. But the free multimedia content you get through Amazon help soften those dislikes. I love that I can connect it to my big screen TV (cable not included) and watch movies and TV.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD 8.9", Dolby Audio, Dual-Band Wi-Fi, 16 GB
Reviews.Author: R. A. Macgregor "StreetRod"
Reviews.Content: Kindle Fire HD 8.9", Dolby Audio, Dual-Band Wi-Fi, 16 GB mostly does what is asked of it. I'd have given it 5 stars if it wasn't so "fussy". I may be that I am used to the older Kindle and need time with this newer version. If I could change anything, it would be the silly on and off button  and make the charge cord port easier to use.  I have to spend lots of time trying to get that charger plug just right. It is a good deal overall however.

Reviews.Title: disappointed
Reviews.Author: Rick
Reviews.Content: I've had this for two weeks now and I can't believe how often the browser and other apps crash. I was so much happier with my 1st generation fire.Apparently the only suggestion to correct the problems, according to the support forums is to use an alternative browser but that doesn't alleviate the other problems.I shouldn't have to install 3rd party apps to use the basic functions of this device.I'll call Amazon but if there isn't a good for it I will probably return it.

Reviews.Title: Love my Kindle!
Reviews.Author: Jazzie
Reviews.Content: It has great color and sound, and it is so easy to use.  I use it every day for reading, games, videos and movies, music, and the internet...Love it!

Reviews.Title: Fire and service.
Reviews.Author: basswalker3
Reviews.Content: This is a replacement Kindle Fire.  I thought I was having problems and so did customer service.  I received the Fire the next day.  Made sure all items were on my new Fire, but I had the same problem with the new one.  It read Battery has stopped.  OK?  I emailed them right away, by the way when I hit the button for them to call me, my phone rang and it was them.  This happened both times I had the problem.  Great customer service.  They since found out the problem related to one of the apps I downloaded from them.  They had a team working on it already when he called me.  Very satisfied with the Fire and customer service.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD 8.9 4G LTE
Reviews.Author: rexie
Reviews.Content: I like the options I have and the clarity of the picture.I highly recommend the Kindle Fire HD 8.9 4G LTE.I am also looking forward to getting the newer version of the Kindle Fire.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet for the price
Reviews.Author: Thomas Connell
Reviews.Content: Purchased this tablet as a gift for my wife and she loves it, plays her games and watches movies from Netflix.

Reviews.Title: Why I returned
Reviews.Author: R.S.CASTORANI
Reviews.Content: I have owned a playbook since they came out. I have always liked it but since blackberry has no future plans it for and 7 inch screen I wanted something larger. I purchased the kindle hd 8.9. I really liked it very much. I only read, do emails and some online reading. My only two disappointments were that I could not read my kobo books and awful on off button location. In landscape mode I always hit it. I returned it and did what I swore I would never do.  I bought the apple air. Now I can read all my books at kobo or amazon.  I bought all my grand children  kindles and they love them.

Reviews.Title: Love, Love, Love my Kindle Fire HD 8.9"!
Reviews.Author: Glasgowgal "Glasgowgal"
Reviews.Content: My Kindle Fire 1st generation died after only a little over a year.  I was very upset since I took such good care of it.  Amazon offered me this replacement at a discounted price.  The Kindle Fire HD 8.9" really helped me get over my grief!  The visual is so clean, bright and crisp. It has some new features that I'm still getting used to, but I have to say I love it!  Would definitely recommend.

Reviews.Title: YAY KINDLE
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I waited until I had this kindle for 5 months before writing a review because I wanted to give more than just a silly first 5 min. impression just out of the box.The more I use my kindle the more I like it.  I don't care about rooting or whatever.  This kindle does everything I personally would want and I couldn't be more pleased.  The picture quality is excellent on movies.  Sound is perfectly adequate but with ear buds the sound is as good as any theater.  I love that I can make internet type bigger for reading and also while reading a book I can change the size of the words which is awesome.  I can also read in bed with no other light and it doesn't strain my eyes. If there was ANYTHING I would change I would say the place on the side where the off button is... grrr I hit that sometimes by mistake and turn it off and have to turn it back on but luckly it remembers where I was and goes right back to that movie or that place in my book or whatever.Also I think the power adapter should be included because with the power adapter the kindle will charge even while watching a movie but without the adapter it won't.

Reviews.Title: Bad
Reviews.Author: Uncle T "TT"
Reviews.Content: Could not download any app via amazons market even with me amazons account . Be careful when buying to use outside US. Is not a product for the whole world.

Reviews.Title: Great brand, but incomplete without charger...
Reviews.Author: Sandra K. Gibbs Bouie "Sandra K. Bouie, Freel...
Reviews.Content: I LOVE MY NEW KINDLE FIRE HD 8.9!  It's handy, accessible and has brilliant color and depth.  The only problem... it didn't come with a charger, which should have been included.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire rating.
Reviews.Author: Cheryl Wilckens
Reviews.Content: It was easy to set up and is easy to use. Also a great size for me when traveling. Picture quality is wonderful and I can access all my internet stuff!

Reviews.Title: Fire HD is a mistake to buy
Reviews.Author: B Masster
Reviews.Content: I was going to update a review I posted when I bought the HD but it doesn't seem to be here anymore.The Kindle HD is not only not worth the extra money but also not worth the extra time it takes to set up and use.  I love my standard Fire and the HD is a regrettable purchase.First the software is geared towards the ads with the customer's purchases second.  It downloads at least twenty "You may also like"s for every item you have on it.  It also downloads ads for all your apps, and for the screensaver.  I only go online once in a while to download a book and it takes ten to twenty minutes for one book download because of all the extra ads downloading first.  It's a nuisance especially when you first get the thing, and try to transfer your other Kindle material to it.The Silk browser is useless.  It stalls within a minute or with any sort of search.The Video tab stalls out constantly too.  The wifi feature has troubles even without a password on the router.

Reviews.Title: Lovin' my Kindle Fire HD!
Reviews.Author: The Mrs
Reviews.Content: I love my Kindle Fire HD. It has met and exceded my expectations!It is quick, efficient, fun, handy and a great value.I do wish it came with a wall charger, however I picked one up for lessthan $3 on eBay. I also wish it could take pics other than "selfies"...butother than those 2 issues, I would buy the Kindle Fire HD again andfor gifts!

Reviews.Title: Charges slowly
Reviews.Author: Karri L Hall
Reviews.Content: There are some things I love about my Fire HD and other things that really bother me. The slow charge is the most bothersome. It's also too heavy for me to hold as a book. I liked my 7 inch better - but the son loves this one to play games on.

Reviews.Title: Meh
Reviews.Author: nicolebm
Reviews.Content: I have to say, I was very excited about this tablet, but it is just ok.  The interface with Amazon is nice.  I would love to have access to google play as well (although I understand not having this).  What drops both stars off for me was the Wi-Fi reception.  If I try to watch something with Prime or download something, even when I have 2 bars, the Kindle tells me that I should check my internet connection.  My phone (which would have 3 bars in the same location) works just fine for these activities.  I can't go to the other end of the house, nevermind upstairs or in the basement.  I have an N router with a fast network (computer, phone, even XBox all connect and work fine upstairs) and the Kindle just won't stay connected unless it is within 20 feet of the router.

Reviews.Title: best of the best
Reviews.Author: ray hoffer
Reviews.Content: Never hardly use lap top anymore, twice as fast, love it. Best money I ever spent , both daughters love it so much they bought their own.

Reviews.Title: An amazing electronic tool!
Reviews.Author: Rosalie A. Varnell
Reviews.Content: am thoroughly enjoying what I know how to do on my new Kindle Fire HD 8.9. Still learning more each day about the different functions, uses and protocols. What an amazing tool. Trying to learn all I can about all the different little things this tablet will do. I'm looking forward to many, many enjoyable hours with my Kindle Fire HD 8.9.

Reviews.Title: Love my Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: Telara
Reviews.Content: I really love my Kindle Fire 8.9, my first one died after about 10 months. It froze up and couldn't be restarted. Amazon replaced it with no problem. Of course, it is still under warrenty. I'm impressed with Amazon and their help desk personnel as well as the prompt shipping of my replacement unit.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: Carnita Dawkins
Reviews.Content: I had the smaller kindle and love it, however this one is better. The screen, sound and not to mentionthe other features. Love It!

Reviews.Title: Refurbished Kindle Fire HD 8.9
Reviews.Author: VagaBond "VagaBond"
Reviews.Content: I'm still in the learning curve on this much more elaborate Kindle.  Sometimes frustrating as with all new tech gadgets.  The colors on the screen are brilliant.  Have to admit I have not downloaded movies or music yet, mostly using it for free library books and email on the go.  Syncing the Contact List didn't work very well, however I am amazed that ALL my picture libraries were transferred in a nano-second and I wasn't even tethered to my laptop!  Not sure how that happened.I cannot tell it's refurbished it looks completely brand new.  Only dislike is that it does not stay charged as long as the old original Kindle.

Reviews.Title: Versatile
Reviews.Author: D. L. Melton
Reviews.Content: Have enjoyed the ability to do so many things on my Kindle while traveling and away from my PC.  I am looking forward to using this for a long time.

Reviews.Title: Love Books, Resisted E-reader, But Love My Kindle
Reviews.Author: LAN Guy
Reviews.Content: I love the look, feel, even the smell of books. I own many, many volumes.I read extensively for both pleasure and for professional reasons. Working in a tech field I am almost constantly refreshing my knowledge. This is what led me to purchase a Kindle.When I saw that Juniper Networks offered many FREE titles and many more publications at prices of less that $2 each I was persuaded to try  a Kindle. I chose the 8.9" for the large screen.I can now carry all of those free and inexpensive tech pubs, as well as 3rd party texts from respected publishers like O'Reilly. And I can highlight text or make notes.I like being able to enlarge the text size and illustrations. And I find the screen very easy to read.In addition to the technical books I have purchased a number of novels, collections of short stories and poetry. I appreciate the ability to check a definition of an unfamiliar word by simply touching it on the screen and calling up the pre-loaded dictionary.Now I can carry all those books in a small convenient package when I travel In the past I often had a "carry-on" sized bag with nothing but tech books when I was flying. What a great convenience.I have also loaded a good deal of music on my Kindle. Now on flights I can listen to my favorite tunes while reading for fun or for work on those long flights.I am MORE than satisfied.Will I still buy traditional books? Yes. But do I like my Kindle? YES!And I ordered a second Kindle for my college student daughter. Many of her texts are available as PDF files or in e-Book format. She can now carry all her text books for the semester on her Kindle. Very convenient.

Reviews.Title: We love it
Reviews.Author: Lally
Reviews.Content: So far, so good. The units, even though refurbished, appear to be brand new and work fine. Combined with the standing leather cases which are sold separately, we are completely satisfied with our purchases, so much that we ordered another refurbished Kindle Fire HD 8.9" 32 4G/wi-fi for our son. He'll receive it this Christmas if we can keep our paws off.

Reviews.Title: Love Love Love this!!!
Reviews.Author: BerryChow
Reviews.Content: I have only bought 2 other refurbished items and both were disasters so I was a little weary about buying a refurbished kindle but I used the gold box deal on this (right before the new version upgrade) and knowing Amazon's great customer support, I couldn't pass this up! I am so glad I got this - I absolutely love it! I have 2 other kindles (1st gen 8.9" and 2nd gen 7") but they aren't 4G and while I use the first one just to read, I got the second to be more portable and to play games on, look at the weather and check my e-mails with a little web surfing while I am at home. It was a gift and I liked that one a lot but I couldn't justify getting another one just because I wanted a bigger size - but with this deal I finally got it - I love that I can use it anywhere (although bummed that the great deal for connectivity was gone - now I am paying $30 a  month for this) and I can't tell it was refurbished - have had it for 2 months now and use it all the time!  Highly recommend this!!

Reviews.Title: Daighter loves it
Reviews.Author: Christina R.
Reviews.Content: Could not ask for anything more. My daughter has tons of books, games, learning activities and movies available at her fingertips. Well worth the investment.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Lorie
Reviews.Content: The only downside I've found thus far (and I've owned it for only a week) is that there is no option to change the screensaver or preset background. Also, many of the apps that are free on Android do cost using Amazon. Otherwise it works great!

Reviews.Title: Highly recommend my Kindle Fire HD
Reviews.Author: Betty Hohrein
Reviews.Content: My Kindle Fire HD truly meets and surpasses my expectations. Altho still in the learning stages of discovering just what it is can deliver, have nothing adverse to submit.  Being a senior and not exposed to all the present day technology in my early school years, my career led me in this direction and since retirement, time is now available to enjoy just with the click of a button.  Thanks again for my Kindle Fire.

Reviews.Title: Book OK; Camera is a BUMMER
Reviews.Author: dominick attanasio
Reviews.Content: Good color, definition and plenty fast.  The camera is a letdown.  There is not a lens to look into to see your subject.  Its only a one-way lens that makes it hard to take pictures and the unit is heavier than my last Kindle 7".  For the money a its a bit much because of the camera situation.

Reviews.Title: I LOVE MY KINDLE
Reviews.Author: Y. Miller "Yolanda"
Reviews.Content: So I can't put it down! I love the screen and all of the cool features. I no longer want an IPAD

Reviews.Title: Like my Kindle Fire HD
Reviews.Author: D. W. Mcquiston "dw mcquiston"
Reviews.Content: Could not afford an actual tablet and this allows me to go online and yet view and edit my existing documents. The only negative note is that it does not recognize many other language fonts. I am also studying Hebrew and I use Powerpoint to make flashcards but the Kindle does not recognize the Hebrew script that is available on Word or Powerpoint

Reviews.Title: lots of fun
Reviews.Author: sangelmarquez
Reviews.Content: I've wanted one of these since the release and I won one from work; I was so excited. Now if I could just keep my son of it I might be able to load a book.

Reviews.Title: I Just Love It
Reviews.Author: Betzabe Garcia
Reviews.Content: I just love my new Kindle Fire. Is very easy to use and its marvelous. Just Great!! The sound and the screen are amazing. Excedeed my expectations.

Reviews.Title: Love it!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Fran Warm
Reviews.Content: At my age its good to have something big enough to read it easily.  I love the apps and since I read a lot, the book list is wonderful

Reviews.Title: Love the Kindle Fire 8.9"
Reviews.Author: M. Stephens
Reviews.Content: I love the Kindle fire HD 8.9" this is actually a replacement  because my first one stopped charging and I had taken out the additional 2 yr. warranty my Kindle was replaced within 2 days with no hassle. My only problem is trying to figure a way to get it away from my 3 y/o Grandson that has taken over possession of it. There are all kinds of apps for preschoolers that he loves to do and he is learning as he plays so that is not a bad thing but he will not turn it loose, I can only pry it from his hands after he has gone to sleep with it. I also like the looks of the new Kindle Fire HDX , it having the front and back cameras is a plus. So maybe Santa will bring me the new Kindle and I can turn over this one to my Grandson for  his Christmas present because it does not look like he is going to surrender it peacefully.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD is nice but.....
Reviews.Author: RVR
Reviews.Content: Nice device with a beautiful screen but low battery life.  Also takes a long time to recharge.  Page turn very touchy.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Alicia Bowlding
Reviews.Content: This is item was purchased as a gift.  It is great for reading, surfing the net, etc.  I definitely recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Item is excellent
Reviews.Author: janelle
Reviews.Content: Though item did not reach on time, my daughter is enjoying every moment of the kindle fire hd.  She's able to have access to books for her age group, games both educational and recreational and is also able to have access to music downloads.  This kindle fire Hd is like having a personal PC at hand.  However, perhaps I haven't explored the features of the camera yet, but currently having problems with resolution.  If there is a problem however, I think that the Hd should have more cameras so that you can take a photo from any angle.  Other than that, this is an excellent tool for any child.

Reviews.Title: I do not like it at all.  I'd rather read a hardcover book.
Reviews.Author: Pat
Reviews.Content: It is not easy to navigate but the worse thing is that it comes with absolutely no directions or manual. I will never get another kindle.  You cab download a manual onto your kindle but then you can't try out things because you can't read the manual while doing anything.

Reviews.Title: Great!! Perfect-sized tablet! Learning tool & Entertainment in one :)
Reviews.Author: Heathwright
Reviews.Content: This is my 2nd Kindle Fire. My 1st one arrived on 10/15/13 and immediately had issues of randomly freezing for a few seconds, then automatically restarting itself (happen 10 minutes after taking out of package, brand new). Contacted Amazon support and after attempting a reboot/hard restart and factory reset, it was determined to be an internal issue with the Kindle -- lucky Amazon replaced it that day, and I received my 2nd one on 10/17/13.  No issues with this one at all! (I think the first one was a dud.)I have an iPAD that I use on a daily basis--but I bought a Kindle Fire for my son. I bought this as a LEARNING TOOL for my child (a 3 yr old, don't bother bashing me!) & as an entertainment tablet for our on-the-go trips and occasional playtime. I love the fact that I can place a time limit on his FreeTime profile and block internet/web connections, downloads/purchases, and his access to other apps. I use apps (ABC/123/shapes) that allow him to "connect the dots" by counting, have him write the letters/numbers, and place the shape in the correct spots. I can set a password for the tablet (to prevent him from using it without my knowledge), and I can set a password that has to be entered before he can exit a game/app/movie (especially for the movie part!).The KindleFire is a perfect tablet for entertaining a child during a car ride/airplane trips or when you are at an appointment that your child wants attention "right now" while you're trying to talk to the doctor -- my son watches his kid shows & movies, and he "reads books" (the Kindle actually reads to him!).  I love the feature of the Kindle reading books to him, as I can't do that while driving.  There are a few games he plays (puzzles, counting, and such) to keep his mind active and to help him learn abstract thinking.I don't really use the Kindle much myself, aside from helping my son with his puzzles and counting/shapes.  I have browsed the internet a few times, not bad at all. I enjoy having this tablet for my son & very happy I bought it! It is a great tablet that can be used for books, apps, and internet. No complaints with this one so far!*** & Just for clarification: I do not use this as an alternative to teaching/playing with my child, nor do I use it as a distraction tool for keeping my son entertained so that I don't have to.  I've seen several comments (here and other links) of people assuming and bashing the buyer for allowing their child to use tablets--MODERATION is key, and monitoring and locking the tablet work just as good to control the amount of time/usage my son has with this. So before you start bashing people, shut up & read the comments! Don't tell me how to raise my child--you don't want me tell you either!  :)

Reviews.Title: BETTER THAN FIRST KINDLE I OWNED.
Reviews.Author: JULIA C. FLYNN
Reviews.Content: Think the Kindle Fire HD is better than my original Kindle.  Easier to read book on the HD.and love reading the newspapers which I never downloaded on old Kindle.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Dexter Kenner
Reviews.Content: Very fast tablet. Wish it was easier to print documents without having to go through so much. Great graphics... Sound also is improved .

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Tricia
Reviews.Content: Pros:  clear picture, fast, lots of appsCons:  NoneI'm enjoying my kindle very much.  Leaning something new each day that I use it.  Well worth it.

Reviews.Title: My Kindle Fire!!!
Reviews.Author: Mrs. H
Reviews.Content: I wasn't sure what I wanted when  I first started looking at Kindle Fire's but the Fire HD 8.9 is wonderful.  It is easy to use and I take it everywhere with me.  I love to read but I also want to be able to search the internet if I want and read my emails and Facebook.  You certainly won't be sorry if you buy it!!!

Reviews.Title: Very good product
Reviews.Author: frog309
Reviews.Content: Bought this on a special sale. Looks and work just like a new kindle fire. Easy to use, nice size, lots of Apps, lots of free Apps, screen quality is VERY good.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: B. Lockrey
Reviews.Content: So far I have had no problems with my new Kindle. I liked the way my other kindle defaulted to my favorites and this defaults to the carousel and I have to tap the star to get to my favorites, but I am getting used to it. Everything has worked nicely and setup was a breeze.

Reviews.Title: Loves it
Reviews.Author: S. Blair
Reviews.Content: I purchased this as a gift and she loves it!  She's had it for a year and it has worked well.  She's had a ton of enjoyment out of it.  The screen is very nice, and the size is great.  This was the 4th Kindle she's had.

Reviews.Title: I Love It
Reviews.Author: GREGORY A BOLDUC
Reviews.Content: I love this thing, I use it every night to put myself to sleep. I don't even need to have a light on to read. I is easy to get new stuff to read without even getting out of bed!

Reviews.Title: Great for reading
Reviews.Author: Karen J. Sanders
Reviews.Content: I used to be an avid reader, but couldn't read once my eyesight started declining.  With the Kindle Fire HD 8.9", I can change the font and size to what ever feels comfortable to my eyes at any time.I'd definitely recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: kindle fire hd 8.5
Reviews.Author: Joanne
Reviews.Content: Love this, I was a little scared because their were no real instructions other than to turn on n off but quickly realized it is so simple to use n FIND what u need. Purchased for my 11 year olds bday n while she is at school I steal it. Lol very cool great price. Love love love.

Reviews.Title: sure again a great reader but tablet?
Reviews.Author: L. Payne
Reviews.Content: Not so much.  Writing this from it.  I have had since Mother's day so have really tried to give it a chance.  First pro, great for Small kids. Screen is strong and seems scratch proof.  Toddler does great with it.  As a reader, again great though like my white when outside.Cons: Terrible as a web browser. Many things unsupported.  Stops responding frequently and says it is Silk not responding. Web based apps frequently glitch or refuse to load properly.  My phone is better.  For the price good as reader and kid app player but not up to adult use with the other tablets out there.  I am going to say spend more for the others and save yourself the aggravation.

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT. . .EXCEPT
Reviews.Author: lina
Reviews.Content: PLEASE! PLEASE! GET RID OF THE OBNOXIOUS CAROUSEL, I HAVE SEIZURES AND THE OVERLAPPING,SCROLLING IS EQUIVALENT TO FLASHING LIGHTS... WIDGETS, JUST LET US HAVE WIDGETS!  THAT SAID THOUGH, I AM EXTREMELY GRATEFUL FOR YOU LISTENING TO US AND INCLUDING IN THE UPDATE MULTI-COLOR HIGHLIGHTERS AS I HAVE A BRAIN INJURY AND BEING ABLE TO BREAK UP THE TEXT ASSISTS COMPREHENSION! THANKS!!

Reviews.Title: Excellent!
Reviews.Author: Napacannoli
Reviews.Content: Excellent!  I searched for some time to try and find a balance between the price of a tablet and the features. There are vast choices to choose from ad ifinally settled on the Kindle Fire HD.  I have had this device for approximately 2 months and have used it more than I thought I would.  My main uses are checking email, surfing the web, eBay, reading books and magazines.So far it has worked great.  There is a large variety of apps to do whatever you may need. It is very user friendly and the screen is bright and clear.  The battery life is good even when streaming videos and lasts forever when just reading a book.I'm not a techie so I don't know much about the specs of this device versus others, but I can say with complete confidence that as a regular user of this device it does everything I want it to and looks great doing it!

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: Wanda M. Johnson "Wolflady"
Reviews.Content: I love my kindle!  It not only is fabulous for all the books I have read, but I have games for me and my grandchildren as well as use it to bank, email, search etc.  It has become my mobile computer even movies on the go.  As long as I have WIFI available, I am all set for anything from need to entertainment!!!

Reviews.Title: Love the Kindle
Reviews.Author: Samara McDonald
Reviews.Content: I finally converted my wife from her Nook Tablet to Kindle Fire. It can do all of what a Nook can do and then some.If you are concerned with losing your Nook library:1. Enable external apps on the Kindle Fire2. Email or Dropbox yourself the .apk3. To find the downloaded app on your Kindle Fire, go to Silk and the menu in the corner,4. Click on downloads5. Click on the .apk6. Click installNow you can have your old Nook library on your Kindle!Beware of any random apps that you might download and install this way, since they aren't from Amazon's app store, Amazon doesn't guarentee they will work properly or not mess up your Kindle.

Reviews.Title: I use it every day for school
Reviews.Author: Chase M.
Reviews.Content: This was the first tablet I've ever purchased. The main reason I got it was for school. I'm a computer engineering major and had a busy semester ahead of me, so I decided to buy one of these to get all of my textbooks on and hopefully lighten up my load. It did just that. I was able to get all the textbooks I needed (in some cases saving a lot of money along the way, although I won't be selling them back), and now I can have everything with me all the time without having to worry about getting a locker or deciding which books I want to leave at home. I spend a lot of time on campus and sometimes do homework from all six of my classes in one day, so this is a great tool to have with me and so far (after a month and a half) it's still working great.I don't use it so much for the movies or music, but I've played with it a little and it works really well. I really have no complaints, except that a newer model came out just a month after I got this one.

Reviews.Title: I love my Kindle
Reviews.Author: Judy Quinn
Reviews.Content: This Kindle works like new, and I love the apps that are available for it. The books are great to read and I love the colors it can display on the screen.The only thing I would like to see improved, is that it could read books to me that are not audio books so I could listen to them when I drive.

Reviews.Title: So clear!
Reviews.Author: rainy
Reviews.Content: It's so much easier to enjoy shows, books, even the games are so much more clearer.  The sound is so much greater then what you expect.  It's perfect for watching movies and listening to music.  Anyone would enjoy this Kindle HD. Get one and see for yourselves.  You will be happy you did.

Reviews.Title: Happy in kindleland
Reviews.Author: ZINCLADY
Reviews.Content: I am happy with my kindle - may be a "refurb" but it looks brand new and the price was excellent, so I splurged with the 32 modelfor 199.00 with a prime membership.  So many apps free so you can try it out. I shop EBAY, Amazon and I can read, watch free TV & Movies through my vios and music.  Sound is lovely, you can read or be read to.  Wow I love playing pacman. etc

Reviews.Title: Not what I expected!
Reviews.Author: Catherine A. Zukauskas
Reviews.Content: If this is suppose to be a real tablet, it needs access to all android apps. I'm just stuck with what you want me to use which for the most part is useless!!!!

Reviews.Title: Battery life
Reviews.Author: James J Sievers Jr
Reviews.Content: Very satisified except for battery life,  Apps are good.  Disappointed that I have to purchase a user's guide that should have come with the kindle.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet
Reviews.Author: mark stumpo
Reviews.Content: Had no issues with this unit since day one, great battery life ans great program selection, almost as good as the Ipad.

Reviews.Title: Stellar performance
Reviews.Author: R. E. Offerhaus "Financial T. fan"
Reviews.Content: I use the kindle as an e-reader and for my newspaper(Financial Times US edition) and magazine (Economist)I used the Kindle alreadfy since its start.The problem I have with the Kindle is: I can not download music to my Kindle or cloud because I am living in Europe.

Reviews.Title: Amazon Kindle Fire's  ROCK
Reviews.Author: Pete  Scuderi
Reviews.Content: For me, this item is awesome.  Wish it had front and rear camera though, and longer battery life.  I have to charge mine 2x a day.  The newer version does address these issues (HDX).  though its $120 more.  Overall though, i'd buy the newer version as it has better screen resolution, more storage, longer battery life, and F/R camera, as well as a faster processor

Reviews.Title: Refurbished but just like new!
Reviews.Author: Carl Johns
Reviews.Content: Picked up this certified  refurbished Kindle and by looking at it you would never know that the device was refurbished. There is not a mark on it and the Kindle works perfectly! Anyone looking for an opportunity to get this Kindle at a great price will not be disappointed.

Reviews.Title: one great little piece of work
Reviews.Author: donald
Reviews.Content: have had it a little over a month now ... used up the coins that came with it; been shopping for more; and, have them in play ... got plenty of apps for games and books .... wife and grandkids just love the thing .... can't get it away from them .... when the grandkids come over; that's the first thing they ask for ... grandpa gets to play along, 'if' I play nice ... make sure you get the bundle of accessories, you'll need them .... as for the charger, it 'should' have come with it .... cost me another 20 bucks; and, they have them at Lowe's for 8 (hindsight) .... unit does just what its supposed to do .... pass time with enjoyment .... I'm glad we got it; and, will come in really handy on trips.

Reviews.Title: So Far So Good
Reviews.Author: goalie
Reviews.Content: I have never had a tablet before and prefer normal web-surfing rather than icons (hate Apple), so I do not have a lot of personal experience to compare the tablet to.  It does provide terrific color and clarity.  Although somewhat non-intuitive, it is fairly easy to operate on a basic level.  I do appreciate that there are quite a few accessories available at decent prices.Since I am really not a big fan of icons/apps, I am still getting used to it.In my fairly uneducated opinion, no one has convinced me there is a better tablet, particularly at better price.

Reviews.Title: Nice device
Reviews.Author: T. Roberts
Reviews.Content: I should preface this review by saying I'm somewhat of a tablet junkie (I've got several). Having said that if you are a person who is only going to have one tablet for everything I'm not sure I could recommend the Kindle Fire HD. It's definitely not a bad tablet and it is great for watching movies but it isn't a strong all around competitor. Internet navigation and just general processing power is not nearly as fast as on any of my Note tablets. However, if you go into this knowing its limitations and being okay with that, then it really shines at what it does do well.

Reviews.Title: love it!!
Reviews.Author: nicole eng
Reviews.Content: Absolutely love it!! So much better than the regular kindle fire!! Definitely would recommend to a friend or anyone who asks!

Reviews.Title: Had a charging problem Amazon fixed it with ease
Reviews.Author: wyattnemma
Reviews.Content: Bought two 8.9 hd and one started charging strange.  Called Amazon to inquire about getting it fixed and they replaced it in two days.  Very happy with their customer service.  Device is extremely user friendly.

Reviews.Title: Love It
Reviews.Author: Diane
Reviews.Content: This is my 2nd one.  LOVE IT!!!!!  Recommend it to everyone that I talk to. I take it with me everywhere .

Reviews.Title: A better way to read.
Reviews.Author: Lewis Baldwin
Reviews.Content: I have owned several Kindles in the past and find it is an excellent way to carry my entire library with me wherever I go. I especially like the back lighting on the 8.9" model.

Reviews.Title: Worth every cent.
Reviews.Author: PageWraith
Reviews.Content: Tight! Works so well you take it for granted. Once you get past the expectation of hiccups, it becomes an extension.

Reviews.Title: everything I wanted
Reviews.Author: bonnig1
Reviews.Content: I loved my previous Kindle Fire but wanted the larger screen. I made a wise decision.  The definition on the 8.9 screen is  excellent and the larger screen makes watching videos most enjoyable. I read nearly all my books with my Kindle. I perform nearly all my online tasks--email, banking, bill payments and general surfing--with it. The pictures the camera takes are beautiful; my daughter said they look better than 'real life.' I found the price to be much more than competitive than other brands of similar devices. In addition, Amazon Kindle help has been, actually, helpful! I could not be more satisfied! Happy, happy!

Reviews.Title: Replacement for broken one I had
Reviews.Author: Peggy Thweatt
Reviews.Content: This replacement Kindle Fire Hd is great.  No problem has happened.  Love my Kindle Fire HD 8.9" Dolby Audio, Dual-Band Wi-fi.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD ... Great tablet
Reviews.Author: LadyD
Reviews.Content: Awesome tablet!!!  Nothing bad about the tablet.  Wish it would have come with charger cord and HDMI cord, but I found them pretty cheap on line.

Reviews.Title: pats View
Reviews.Author: Patricia C. Curley
Reviews.Content: This was a replacement for one that stop working. I have bought two of these(one for me and one for my husband) and both them had to replaced. I also have the 7" kindle(which I only use to listen to Iheart radio and the reader which is the only one that I do not have a problem with.  I do not like the fact that there is no Adobe flash but that I can live with since I can use my phone if I want to see a video but I am totally disgusted with the silk browser. It is constantly unresponsive and when I try to share something on Facebook it takes about 5 minutes. I have cleared my history and have even started back from factory settings and nothing helps. I tried the dolphin browser which is a little better but not much. I bought them mainly because of price but I will never buy another one.

Reviews.Title: love my kindle
Reviews.Author: V. H. Forsythe
Reviews.Content: I am enjoying my kindle fire, it's everything I wanted and more. I am new at all the things it can do and haven't figured some of it out. The problem I have with it is using the camera, so I wouldn't advise buying it for camera use.

Reviews.Title: HD 8.9"
Reviews.Author: Robert Hankins
Reviews.Content: Great screen! Grandchildren are happy with the Free Time, (started the program free trial), will probably pay for the program to continue.  Fairly easy to navigate the kindle, however I do recommend getting the online manual for more effective us. I should have waited for the HDX, but I am pleased with the Kindle.

Reviews.Title: cool toy and work tool
Reviews.Author: Sage Collum
Reviews.Content: It's my first tablet and I haven't used it much yet.  I have downloaded kindle books, checked my email, and played a game, Flow Free, which I like.  The size is small enough to curl up with and large enough to see and use the touch screen easily.  The display is brilliant and clear.  There seem to be some limitations to what I can access with the browser or what browser I can download.  I can't find any place that has an equivalent of "properties" on my computer, where I can get specific information on the hardware or software.One really cool feature is that if I download kindle books, I can have the Fire read it aloud.  It's under Accessibility, probably for people with limited vision, but I could use it when I'm driving or doing other activities that prohibit reading.  Another is that I can get apps and use the cloud for my work, which qualifies it as a legitimate business expense.

Reviews.Title: My hearts on Fire for my Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: Renee Hills Vargas
Reviews.Content: Wow!  I cannot say enough about this item.  I was reticent to purchase any kind of tablet...but I am going to Fiji...and the last thing I want is to carry my laptop...it is very heavy....  so I changed my mind based on friends recommendations who bought two for a Hawaii trip.  Fast EASY EASY EASY....I was watching videos within 5 minutes of receiving the package...can get all my e-mail and the Prime membership is invaluable!  I order most products I use through Amazon...save a lot on shipping!

Reviews.Title: AWESOME KINDLE AND SUPPORT TEAM
Reviews.Author: starla5p
Reviews.Content: IT WAS GIVEN TO ME AS A GIFT. BUT I CHOSE THIS ONE AND HAVE BEEN VERY HAPPY. AND THE SUPPORT TEAM FOR KINDLE ARE AWESOME.+

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT !!!!
Reviews.Author: Terry M Mahlon
Reviews.Content: We got it mainly to use for books it turns out to be useful for a lot of things !  The video streaming is fantastic !  And if you put the money into a hdmi cable, you can stream high quality video to your TV.  I've already told several of my relatives to mnot waste money on the more expensive tablets, this one is a winner.

Reviews.Title: Love my Kindle!
Reviews.Author: Carrie D.
Reviews.Content: I use my Kindle all the time and have had no issues with battery.  I've watched movies, read, surfed, worked on my website, played games, etc...  I guess if I had to suggest any improvement it would be the camera and software to use it.  The quality of pictures is low and you have to purchase or download a free program to do anything beyond viewing pictures.  Taking them is awkward because the lens and button to take the picture are on the same side so without an eye viewer to look through, it is really awkward to take a picture at all.Like I said though, Love this Kindle.  I didn't buy it for the camera so the lack of a quality camera is no biggie for me.  I thought I read also you can download video programming to shoot video as well but I won't be in a hurry to download that.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: ava
Reviews.Content: This product is great for reading of course but also for watching videos very good picture. I just love it would recommend to anyone.

Reviews.Title: kindle fire hd 8.9
Reviews.Author: Brandon Gustin
Reviews.Content: This is the most awesome device i have ever owned. I love it. Best picture i have ever seen on any device

Reviews.Title: It Works
Reviews.Author: Jack
Reviews.Content: The display is nice and bright and is very easy to read. Resolution is excellent. The touch screen interface works mostly flawlessly, but it's easy to accidentally activate it when not wanted. My only complaints are the fact that it is somewhat heavy to hold for prolonged periods and it needs a real instruction manual. I found a free "Tips and Tricks" manual online that uncovered some of its secrets, but I think the manual should have been included.

Reviews.Title: good quality
Reviews.Author: Linda Rajic
Reviews.Content: Received the kindle timely.  Easy to set up and use.  Lots of fun apps.  I love the size.  Makes looking for recipes in the kitchen fun.

Reviews.Title: awesome upgrade
Reviews.Author: Robert Johnson
Reviews.Content: Short story. I bought the kindle fire he as an upgrade in preparation for ny trip to Germany. The music and movies were amazing and the battery held with time to spare. I am more than satisfied. I've already recommend the upgrade to a friend

Reviews.Title: Big learning curve, but worth it
Reviews.Author: carolyn
Reviews.Content: Finally an electronic device I can easily read while traveling or when the power goes out. Lovely crisp  text. I read quickly, and there's enough type on the page that I'm not constantly scrolling.The color is also crisp, the battery life is long, and it works well as a tablet. It's not as intuitive to learn as my Mac, and it would have helped if there had been a pamphlet on how to get started. Some information is buried 2 or 3 clicks down in the menus. (I gather the newest models have a button available to summon instant help). I never use the camera or music. I'm very, very happy with it.

Reviews.Title: Kindle review
Reviews.Author: susan mallory
Reviews.Content: Terrific item, very simple to operate, nice clean package, easily viewable in bright daylight. Telling me how many more words I need to use to review this item is very troubling and I'm about to change my mind how I feel about.

Reviews.Title: Very Impressed!
Reviews.Author: Melanie A. Hackbarth
Reviews.Content: After deciding to catch up in this technical world, I did quite a bit of research in deciding on which tablet I wanted to purchase.  There are many options, but for what I wanted (strictly for entertainment while traveling), I found that for half of the price of many tablets, the Kindle Fire HD more than fits the bill.  It can do most of what the higher priced tablets do, and the sound and picture quality are outstanding!

Reviews.Title: kindle fire hd
Reviews.Author: granam
Reviews.Content: love my kindle fire i use it daily when mine quit working it was still under warinty i caled they sent me a new one had it before they said i would and the tings i had stored in cloud was put in my new one yea for amazon

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire 8.9"
Reviews.Author: Roy Edens
Reviews.Content: Such a vast improvement over the old 7" kindle I had. Screen is much bigger and HD makes it much easier to read, even outside.I do read a lot and with this I can get my Email, Facebook,m You Tube updates etc much much easier.I take it with me wherever we go and I use it every day for reading but for internet usage it needs to be near a router.The sound system is very good but I have yet to use video applications but intend to learn very soon.It is a great addition that I fully enjoy.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD 8.9
Reviews.Author: Gilbert M Mello
Reviews.Content: Somewhat disappointed with the Kindle Fire HD 8.9. I use it mainly for reading books and after reading for a while it shuts itself off and reboots itself leaving to look for where you were in the book. It also has a tendency to freeze up and you have to close it down and wait a while for it to reset itself before you can go back to doing what ever task you were doing. Also when your finished reading you can not go back to the home page without writing a review of the book. If you do not want to write a review you have to shut down the devise and restart it to get to the home page. The bookmark feature does not always work the way it should so you have to go hunting for your place in the book your reading. On the good side the screen is good size, the graphics are good and easy on the eyes.  All in all I don't think I would buy another one. Its OK but less than I expected.

Reviews.Title: better than chocolate
Reviews.Author: dm59yellow
Reviews.Content: Don't know how I managed to live without it. I had the original kindle fire and still love it but this one is so much easier to see and use . LOVE IT

Reviews.Title: I love my Kindle Fire!!
Reviews.Author: Christine Watters "CWatters"
Reviews.Content: I mainly bought my Kindle to read books and and possible watch movies but I can do so much more and am loving every minute!

Reviews.Title: Refurbished Kindle Fire HD 8.9"
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I have been having problems with it. It keeps turning off on me and  frankly I am very annoyed with it. I do like other things about it and the size is great but until I find out what is wrong with it my rating of the devise must remain low.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD 8.9", Dolby Audio, Dual-Band Wi-Fi, 16 GB - Includes Special...
Reviews.Author: D. Esquibel
Reviews.Content: I had the regular Kindle Fire before but this one is wonderful.  Although its a little heavy, still very much worth it!

Reviews.Title: GREAT Device
Reviews.Author: Robert  S.
Reviews.Content: I just received this item a couple days ago, so far everything is going really well.  Great feel to the touch screen and quick up loading ability.  I am really impressed with the color quality of the HD with this product.  Can't wait to see a movie on this item.  I would absolutely recommend this Kindle Fire HD to anyone looking for a great priced tablet.

Reviews.Title: A good device.
Reviews.Author: homebody
Reviews.Content: Graphic quality and sound are excellent.  The Wi-Fi runs surprisingly fast and the availability of apps is outstanding.  My only critique is that the on screen keyboard is awkward.  All in all a good machine.

Reviews.Title: Myh newest Kindle
Reviews.Author: whiskers
Reviews.Content: It is impossible to believe that this Kindle is "refurbished."  I am having such a good time reading and playing on the newer larger screen.  My sister is very jealous and I am sure she will be ordering one.  Thank you.Gail Trocchio

Reviews.Title: Great Poduct
Reviews.Author: Beverly B. Harris "Ms. Beverly Baker-Harris"
Reviews.Content: I am so enjoying my Kindle refurbished HD 8.9 Kindle and it works perfectly so far . Easy to understand and use

Reviews.Title: Refurbished Kindle Fire is wonderful - recommend it
Reviews.Author: Luce "L.A."
Reviews.Content: It arrived in perfect condition.  It met all of my expeditions. I love "facebook" on it.  I check my emails instead of turning on my PC on weekends and can answer them easily.  Books are easy to download and read.  Refurbished is the way to go.  Its a lot better than an iPod which is SO tiny to respond to emails.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Tv, books, docs, personal projects are all getting done. This is our families second one and we love them both.

Reviews.Title: Drooling no more.
Reviews.Author: Jujubes
Reviews.Content: I've wanted an e-reader for several years, but could only recently afford to seriously entertain the idea.  I saw the special price, in an aggregator e-mail; culls offers from multiple sites.  I bit the bullet & LOVE, LOVE, LOVE my Kindle!

Reviews.Title: Kindle for life
Reviews.Author: kodocat
Reviews.Content: I started with a keyboard kindle and thought this was it! My husband got the kindle fire but besides games it didn't interest me.  When he got me the Kindle Fire HD 8.9" 4G LTE I thought this was overkill.  I almost sent it back too large but decided to give it a chance.  You know some people don't like change.  Well I got a great cover stant and  started with a game, then streamed a show, then went to the apps and I've taken off.  I can do most anything I want on this thing.  I did have to buy wireless air time but I rarely need it as I'm within wireless connections most times.  I also got a supercharger that cut my time for charging a plus it worked on my phone too. I love that all my books from my keyboard kindle are available.  Who says you can't use two kindles.  When I need something compact I still use my old keyboard or use my husbands smaller fire. I'm not embarrassed to admit we are a kindle family.  I've gifted my daughter one, Next will be the grandkids.

Reviews.Title: Serviceable.
Reviews.Author: CanIGoNow
Reviews.Content: The one real disappointment about this device is the battery/charging situation. It's kind of a complete joke. The battery drains within an hour or two, even when it's plugged in as you're using it. I've had several instances of plugging it in to charge via USB while I'm at work (read: not using it) only to find that it has not only not charged at all, but drained to the point of shutting off. I've also plugged it in to charge overnight in a wall outlet and woke up to find that, again, it hasn't charged but has drained and shut off. I plugged it in to a different outlet, checked it after 30 minutes or so to make sure something was happening, and then left it plugged in for another ten hours. When I checked it before bed, it was charged to 86%. That is nothing short of ridiculous, I'm sorry.I am aware of a special "quick charge" device that you can purchase separately to charge in under 5 hours (Wow, you're kidding! Strap in and put your helmets on kids, this is ludicrous speed! /sarcasm #Spaceballs), but I think it's absurd that you have to buy a "special charger" to make the thing function normally.The picture is fine, the sound is fine, the app availability is marginal, the interface is acceptable. It's hard to care about much else when you can't even use it for any reasonable length of time.In this case you get what you pay for. It was cheap, and it functions accordingly. I wouldn't buy this again, nor recommend it to others. If I need a new tablet in the next year or two (which seems likely), I'll look elsewhere for a device with a less flaccid battery.

Reviews.Title: Keeps getting better
Reviews.Author: Derrek
Reviews.Content: My Kindle history started with the original, then when the fire came out I had to have one.  Loved the Fire.  I contemplated for a very long time about the HD though.  I was back and forth between an Ipad, tablet, or a Fire HD.  I was so close to buying an Ipad but decided to stay loyal to Amazon.  I was not disappointed.  I still haven't really explored all the features.  I just found out I can connect a Bluetooth keyboard to make typing easier, which is awesome.  Everything is sharper than the old Fire, which was already pretty awesome.  The larger size makes everything better too.  If you are trying to make the same decision, I would look at it this way: If you want a tablet that can do everything, you will need to pay well over a thousand dollars.  With the Ipad and Android tablets you still pretty much need a computer.  With that in mind, if you look at what you are getting for the price, Kindle Fire HD is definitely the way to go.

Reviews.Title: So much better than my old kindle
Reviews.Author: Joseph Jaworski
Reviews.Content: So much fun, I pick it up and the hours just fly by.  Love the big bright screen and how it senses motion. No complaints,

Reviews.Title: I enjoy it
Reviews.Author: lori
Reviews.Content: I like the size.  The weight is a bit less than my original Kindle Fire.  Easy to use.  I haven't had it long enough to encounter any real issues.

Reviews.Title: Very entertaing!
Reviews.Author: Marc
Reviews.Content: Great product! Packed with entertainment. Fire is the bomb! Wish I could access Fire on my smartphone like I can my books.

Reviews.Title: perfect
Reviews.Author: Hu Neng Zai
Reviews.Content: it's my first pad, i just want to be more different with my friends, so i chose it. It's very good,  i like it very much!

Reviews.Title: Good Product
Reviews.Author: Dawn
Reviews.Content: I really like the kindle for reading and watching movies which is what I do to relax. It was easy to get started and tech support is easy to access with friendly assistance of the staff.  My only issue has been that it does not last 10 to 11 hours when I watch movies.  I have called tech support numerous time but cannot seem to get the time up over about 5 hours.  I am thinking I must be doing something wrong.

Reviews.Title: LOVE MY KINDLE!
Reviews.Author: bnpruitt
Reviews.Content: I love love love my Kindle. It has been my best friend since I got it almost a year ago. I read on it, watch movies on it, play games on it, let my kids play on it, and use it for surfing the web. I also used it for Skype while my husband was deployed and I absolutely loved it. It worked great! I have never had any problems with it and would purchase another one in a heart beat!

Reviews.Title: im very happy with my new kindle fire hd 32GB
Reviews.Author: Ferne D. Spence
Reviews.Content: it's great to have a tablet now.  the kindle fire offers features that are as good or in some cases even better than other tablets and for a reasonable price.  yes the apps are rather big, but still, i love all that the functions of a PC are offered by the Kindle.

Reviews.Title: Very good kindle fire..
Reviews.Author: wvlady
Reviews.Content: Love my new HD Kindle Fire and appreciate Amazon giving me a trade-in on my old kindle fire. I will be a Kindle Fire customer for life and Amazon never lets me down and they have a great tech support for help with your Kindle Fire. I LOVE AMAZON...The best place on the net to shop for great deals...

Reviews.Title: Slight shortcomings of the kindle fire.
Reviews.Author: michael vincent thornton
Reviews.Content: I wish it had usb port and a camera that would shoot forward.  The customer service is the best I have ever encountered.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD 8.9"
Reviews.Author: Austin Copeland
Reviews.Content: Works like a dream, met & exceeded all expectations.I would recomment it to all people wanting that size.Works better than most notepads we compared it to.

Reviews.Title: Wow !
Reviews.Author: Judi
Reviews.Content: I am an older lady and I fell in love with this thing. I can't believe all that it can do and every day I find it can do more. I have a senior husband that hogs the remote for the TV and we watch what he wants to watch. Well no more !  Now I can turn to my Kindle and watch movies or programs that I like or play some of my favorite games. It is amazing !

Reviews.Title: Great size and clarity
Reviews.Author: MeMeof4
Reviews.Content: delivered in one day with prime - I love the clartity of the HD and it is great for reading or watching movies.  I own a smaller kindle fire but this is great because of the screen size - easier on my eyes

Reviews.Title: Nice to use
Reviews.Author: Christina m. Chandler
Reviews.Content: Like the Kindle Fire HD 8.9.  Easy to read books, and I'm a die-hard bibliophile.  Sad the camera stinks because it really doesn't have a camera, it has Skype.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: kelela
Reviews.Content: Love the bigger screen and the HD for movies.  Works well.  Play on it all the time as well as my granddaughter.

Reviews.Title: WOW!
Reviews.Author: Denise Masotto
Reviews.Content: I Love this product! The process was easy and it shipped quickly! I am still learning how to operate it but I will get it going soon. Thanks Amazon for all of the directions and help available.

Reviews.Title: What can I say?
Reviews.Author: Nathaniel
Reviews.Content: The best decision I have made (money and purchasing wise) in a long long time. It works great, user friendly. Even some of my elderly patients picked it right up love love love it!!

Reviews.Title: For my 13 yo nephew
Reviews.Author: Grace
Reviews.Content: This was a Christmas present to the nephew who has everything.  Surprisingly, he's still using it when he usually moves to the next shiny thing pretty quickly.  I say, that means it's a good product.

Reviews.Title: kindle
Reviews.Author: jfhygg
Reviews.Content: I love it.  but i wish it had a camera in the back so we couldl take pictures of others.

Reviews.Title: Been waiting to get this
Reviews.Author: Dainty Di
Reviews.Content: I would have said "love it" but I'm still tweeking it. Still getting to know my Kindle--but I'm having a great time with it!  Downloaded the Dolphin browser so that I can watch YouTube and network TV movies and shows on it.  Works great!  I also subscribed to "Love My Kindle Fire" blog and that's where I got a lot of info on tweeking it and tips and links to downloads--best apps etc.  I still need a computer--doesn't replace that--but I travel to see my kids and grandkids a lot and it's great on the go to keep up with Facebook and email.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD
Reviews.Author: MsJazz
Reviews.Content: I have upgraded my Kindle Fire and it was well worth it.  I am enjoying using it.  Plan to stop my home delivery of newspapers and read them on the Kindle

Reviews.Title: It is just OK
Reviews.Author: Carlisle J Valente
Reviews.Content: I have had e-readers,tablets and ipad.  I am disappointed as this one jumps pages when I am reading and also goes to wrong chapters in the book I am reading.  My cheap pandigital was easier to use.  My ipad which is the ipad 1 is the best.  I only got the Kindle fire HD because I did believe it would be a better unit.  No tech support by phone!

Reviews.Title: perfect for my needs
Reviews.Author: street rat
Reviews.Content: This tablet is great. Some great apps are available.  I don't regret choosing this kindle over the iPad. Only problem that I have run into is that sometimes if I'm switching from app to app it seems like the tablet is having a hard time keeping up.

Reviews.Title: I love the new Kindle HD 8.9!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Eileen
Reviews.Content: I love the bigger screen, the picture clarity and the ease of purchasing items through Amazon. With my keyboard case, I can perform most computer functions on the Kindle.I am definitely a Kindle Fan!!!!

Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: Reta Thatcher
Reviews.Content: Its just like an apple iPad but cheaper! Its a good size if you want to read a book or watch a movie. I just love it

Reviews.Title: kindle Fire hd
Reviews.Author: linda Zubrycki
Reviews.Content: I love my kindle fire. Don't know how I lived without it.I love books and I never thought I'd be happy reading on a tabletBut that's all I use now. I also find it very easy to purchase things. I use it for my email and watch different episodes of shows on it. I am very happy that I bought it.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Tama
Reviews.Content: It was so much nicer than my other Kindle.  The other kindle was good but this one has the camera, the sound is so much better, visual is better... I just like everything about it!

Reviews.Title: kindle my 2nd
Reviews.Author: maria
Reviews.Content: Love my new kindle.  I bought the 8'9 this time which makes watching videos a lot easier on my eyes!!!  The HD is great!  Beautiful clear movies etc.  Great buy for the money!!

Reviews.Title: Love
Reviews.Author: Jennifer L. Cook "Bar10jen"
Reviews.Content: the Kindle Fire.  I like that I can read at night without having to have a light shining on the screen like my 2nd generation!

Reviews.Title: Pump up the Jam
Reviews.Author: cigam
Reviews.Content: I have been exposed to other Android and Apple products and would not give up my Kindle. Why, you might ask?It's affordable, it"s easy to use, It stays charged, it fits my needs. The only issue is that when compared to some other Androids and the larger fruit pad I could use another 10 to 15 db volume boost.

Reviews.Title: It does it all
Reviews.Author: Elmer
Reviews.Content: Easy to maintain and has so much you can do with it. Clarity of reading and viewing. So fast in downloading whatever you are seeking.

Reviews.Title: its a really good  profuct
Reviews.Author: E. Hyman "Sassy1"
Reviews.Content: i upgraded to this item when the regular kindle hd  i had fell in water and basically bit the the big one.. i made the decision that i was going to upgrade and amazon offered me  a discount to do so. i like this product it does a lot more than i know what to do with.. i wish i were more kindle literate because im definitely not utilizing it as much as i should. the sound is good. graphics are good. i am happy with this item

Reviews.Title: Kindle FireHD 8.9"
Reviews.Author: Sheryl Malone
Reviews.Content: I love it. I have been wanting it for a long time. The dolby is much better than I expected. Highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Steven J. Ulitto
Reviews.Content: Pretty easy to use for someone not so computer literate. If I run into a problem I just ask for help and someone calls me right away with an answer. Was a little hesitant about getting it at first but glad I did.

Reviews.Title: For What it comes with for the price it fine
Reviews.Author: Don Hamel
Reviews.Content: It needs a voice application so you can do voice to text.  I know people complain about no GPS but that's not the design no the design of this device. Great Screen, Fast Response to touch.  Great Audio.  The networking on this device is fantastic, good distance from the network.  Needs more applications like other Droid Devices, hopefully Amazon is looking to add these.  Other than no Voice to Speech I would have rated it a 5.

Reviews.Title: Love, Love, Love!
Reviews.Author: Megan Freesin
Reviews.Content: This is by far the best purchase I've ever made!  I love my Kindle Fire HD!  For me, it was definitely worth it to pay extra for the larger screen because many of the games I've downloaded have excellent graphics that deserve the extra space.  It is very easy to use, especially for someone like me who was unfamiliar with tablets at the time I purchased it.  It has already proven to be worth its price in the hours of entertainment it has given me.  I also love the Cloud feature that stores all of my books and programs even if I remove them from my device.  For someone who is an avid reader it is more than handy to be able to store all of your books in one, easy to access place.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD 8.9
Reviews.Author: Sonny
Reviews.Content: This is my 3rd kindle for our family and we love it.  It met all of our expectations.  Excellent quality and the picture is wonderful.

Reviews.Title: Great customer service and device
Reviews.Author: bryan kaye
Reviews.Content: Works great. Had an issue with my first kindle turning on when I called customer service they sent me a NEW replacement kindle. Some company's would send a refurbished device. After all I think it was the case I bought for it that was malfunctioning not the device. So far I love it. Fast and works well.

Reviews.Title: Just perfect!
Reviews.Author: B. Wolberg "Kindle Krazy"
Reviews.Content: I had the first Kindle Fire when it came out and sold it thinking I wouldn't use it much.  Then I saw this and thought, ok.... I gotta have it.  It is set up to be my on the go computer.  Beautiful display, sound, everything.  Perfect price!

Reviews.Title: My First Tablet
Reviews.Author: Erin B. Parker
Reviews.Content: Just about everything has been written about it already, so I'll just add my two cents worth:I've never owned a tablet, or any Apple product so I can't compare this to anything.  All I can say is from my point of view, I am loving it so far.  I got 8.9 inch about a week ago.  I got a really great deal on a refurbished one.  I was happy to find out the charger for my previous Kindle works with this.  So far, I've used it to watch Netflix, browse the web, play games and read.  Display is beautiful, browser is quick.  Sound is very good.  It has everything I need and I'm very happy I purchased it. I got the MoKo Slim-fit Folio Cover Case and I'm happy with it as well.

Reviews.Title: My fourth kindle
Reviews.Author: Becky Davis
Reviews.Content: This is my fourth kindle purchase.  I had the original kindle for about a year, then bought the first kindle fire that came out.  I loved the first fire because of the back lit screen, and the ability to look at e-mail, etc. I then purchased the kindle paperwhite for reading in the car or at the beach because it is small, lightweight, and the fact that the sun didn't glare on the screen.  I gave away/sold my other kindles when purchasing new ones, but have kept the kindle paperwhite for the above mentioned reasons.  Now, this new Kindle is the bomb.  Amazing screen, love to play games on it, easy to see, fast web browsing, and is even great to watch movies/tv shows on it.  I use my hdmi cord and hook it up to our 70" tv to watch tv shows and it works perfectly.  So many things you can do with it, and it's so inexpensive! Can't go wrong with it.  Highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: so far I like it
Reviews.Author: Michelle Adleman-Walker "nutmeg"
Reviews.Content: So far it is fun to watch movies in bed, check email, and do some reading all on the same device. I would of liked a bigger view screen and had looked at a few but I do watch a lot of movies on line and it lets you hulu,netflix, and several others. Loading dofin was a pain in the butt. I guess loading most things are easier to do on computers for me though. Most of the programs loaded already are ok for everyday such things, but i did like that amazon sent me 5$ worth of funds to add on my own stuff. Read reviews before loading stuff, get to know what your money is being spent on before you buy it. Not impressed with product as it is over a year old but like it enough to say i would buy it again. The dual band wi-fi is better than my wifes laptop for keeping things streaming. As for the cam it sucks so don't think it is worth taking photo's from this machine, buy a cam. The screen is sharp and I enjoy the picture quality. I don't know how to do some things on the kindle yet but am learning.

Reviews.Title: really disappointed
Reviews.Author: L. D. Gaines
Reviews.Content: the weight is good, the size is good, the picture quality is good, but i'm not pleased with the fact that is freezes  alot and i have to recharge it alot, and there is no front and back camera

Reviews.Title: Nice Product
Reviews.Author: Jag
Reviews.Content: Love this Kindle Fire HD. Good quality picture and worth money spent on this very nice, easy to use tablet.Very good experience with this product.

Reviews.Title: GREAT Purchase
Reviews.Author: scouzo
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my parents and they haven't really gotten into the new tablet technology or even smart phone technology. Not only did it come very easy to them because of the intuitive design and functionality of the Kindle, but it has been fun and reliable. The size of the Kindle is perfect and it's really sleek and durable. It's also very fast and quick to pick up outside wifi networks. This is a great gift and a fantastic starter-tablet for anyone. I highly recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD
Reviews.Author: Dusty Corrals "OneGypsyTraveler"
Reviews.Content: I got my Fire about a year ago and I just love it. it's easy to manage, its the perfect size. I have had many people with other brands of Pads tell me the picture quality is way better than theirs. If you have a Mom or Dad that's afraid of a computer, this is the item for them. Easy to work with  work on and Kindle Support is the best there is BAR NONE. I highly recommend Kindle Fire HD

Reviews.Title: Basically like it but it is slow to respond
Reviews.Author: Judy Carlsbad
Reviews.Content: This is my 3rd Kindle.  The touch screen does not respond as well as my smaller Kindle.  Right now I cannot get it off the greeting so I will have to turn it off and put it back on again and I have only had it for a little over a week.  The plug is in a terrible place as I keep it sideways all the time and as a result the plug is in the bottom so it is hard to use this Kindle while it is plugged in.  Also I am not happy about having a camera in it.  I wish there was an option with no camera.  The videos and sound are very good on this Kindle and email is easier.  Right now I am unable to access the home button as it shows up nowhere on the Kindle.  Unless I press full screen I would really like it better if the home button was available at all times.  It was very easy to set up and most of my cloud apps were there but not all that I thought I had.  I did not realize that some of them would stay on my other Kindle and not appear in the cloud.  I use both Kindles and since I found a good case at Staples I probably will be happier.

Reviews.Title: Pretty Nice!
Reviews.Author: Dollup
Reviews.Content: The wife loves it! Bought it for her birthday! Now the kids can show her how to use it. She wishes it was more intuitive and that web layout was not so small, tiny font. All in all I would rate it at 89%, not bad for the price...

Reviews.Title: Great Reader!!
Reviews.Author: Ken M Cottrell
Reviews.Content: I thoroughly enjoy the Kindle Fire HD.  I'm an avid reader & started with a regular Kindle.  The 8.9"& backlit HD screen made it come alive.  I never thought I would not enjoy holding a book to read it but now it seems like drudgery.  I love being able to touch the screen to turn a page. Also, having Wi-Fi is great when I'm away from my computer.  I don't necessarily like the carousel but can live with it.  I would rather have icons on 1 screen.  Only problem I had was a battery that seemed to go bad.  I read up & other people that got this Kindle when it first came out had the same problem but Amazon replaced it right away.

Reviews.Title: Excellent buy for the price!
Reviews.Author: cinji
Reviews.Content: The Kindle Fire 8.9" is a great value.  The screen resolution is stunning, reading is enjoyable, and apps are easy to use.  Is it an iPad killer?  Not exactly, but it will do most things.  You can still check and create email, do Facebook, and play some games, but as others have said, the Amazon apps are limited.  I like that I can watch both Netflix and Amazon Prime video (Android tablets like the Nexus 7 have issues with Amazon Prime--I think it can be done, but not easily for the non-tech-savvy. Of course it's a problem on a Nook since they are the competition, which is too bad because the Nook tablet has an amazing screen).The size is a nice in-between the 7" and 10". For the money it's hard to beat.  I gave it a 4 because of the limitations of the apps and because I'm not a fan of the carousel, but those are not deal-breakers.  This tablet is perfect for the value-conscious person.

Reviews.Title: my third kindle
Reviews.Author: Joan Harper
Reviews.Content: Had the seven inch kindle previously and like this larger size screen more because it is so much easier to read and the larger pictures are great especially for videos , hd quality very good..

Reviews.Title: The Fire HD 8.9"
Reviews.Author: Lisette
Reviews.Content: This is a great buy.  I am very satisfied with everything the Fire Kindle has to offer.  The only reason I gave It four stars is because it is quite heavy compared to my ordinary kindle.  I know the Fire Kindle is larger than the first Kindle Amazon came out with.  I would think the Fire Kindle could be made lighter.

Reviews.Title: Great as a reader and for video, OS is substandard
Reviews.Author: moose_of_many_waters
Reviews.Content: I bought this mostly as a pdf and MS doc reader for book-length manuscripts.  The 7" tablets and 6" eReaders that are out there have too small a screen for me for extended use.  At the price a refurb of the 8.9 HD was offered on sale, I thought it would be worth trying out.  It's a pretty good reader for pdfs, although there isn't any ability to change font size unless you try to convert pdfs into Kindle format via email, which is a hit and miss process.  The screen is fantastic for reading MS docs, very sharp and the 8.9 size makes reading long docs a breeze.I also looked at the ability to watch video (TV and movies) through my Prime account.  The screen is great for that as well, but apparently you can only stream free content.  You can't download unless you pay, which makes this device less desirable for airplane viewing.  Google Play on my 7" Android tablet seems to have a more interesting selection of movies for rental.So the Kindle Fire 8.9 HD is a very good to fantastic device as an e-reader and a pretty good device for watching TV shows and movies.  But as a tablet for apps it isn't good.  Basically, Amazon has defanged the Android OS to make this device work best as an Amazon product delivery system.  Standard apps for Android, like Google Navigation, aren't available.  There are many key apps I use on my Android 7" tablet and Apple iPhone that aren't available.  Everything seems to be oriented toward buying books, movies, TV shows, and apps through Amazon.  It's more than a bit annoying, and the OS used isn't nearly as slick as you'd find with a pure Android or Apple tablet.I'll be happy to use this as a reader for book-length manuscripts.  The quality and size of the screen hold a lot of appeal to me.  But I'll keep using my iPhone and Android 7" tablet for apps.  This device comes up short in that department.

Reviews.Title: What was I waiting for?
Reviews.Author: Suz
Reviews.Content: Well, actually, I was waiting for a good price cut on the Fire HD models, while continuing to use my old first generation 7" Kindle Fire.Last week, Amazon ran a daily deal featuring seriously discounted certified refurb Kindle Fire HD 8.9" tablets, so I bought one (32GB).I don't, strictly speaking, or even loosely speaking, *need* this thing. But I certainly like it. It has drawbacks, mostly the stupid carousel interface. I just splurged another fifteen bucks to get rid of the "special offers" so maybe the interface will be less annoying now.However, the display is fine, operations are quick, sound is good (through headphones or small external speakers), and I'm enjoying streaming Amazon Prime video on the FIre HD. I've been able to load (by USB) some instructional video files and some photos onto the tablet, which I like being able to view without needing to be online.I knew it would be an upgrade from my old Kindle Fire, but have been delighted by the improved performance.I was able to snag the Amazon Kindle Fire HD 8.9" Standing Leather Case, Saddle Tan during a Lightning Deal on the same day I bought my discounted refurb HD, which was a lucky buy. It's a really good case, but even at the discount not exactly cheap.Overall, I'm not sorry I waited, but am also not at all sorry I finally bought this Fire HD in the larger size.

Reviews.Title: Silk is a good reason to not buy a Kindle.
Reviews.Author: Karyn Best
Reviews.Content: For emails, books, games and many other reasons I like the Kindle. For going on line, you have to deal with Silk.  I am sick and tired of seeing the message that Silk has stopped working.  If you are using a tablet mostly on line, which I do not, investigate your options. I cannot even use google maps without Silk locking up.

Reviews.Title: Really love my Kindle!
Reviews.Author: Ronald D. Jones
Reviews.Content: I've bought a lot of neat electronics over the years but this is by far the best. The preloaded web browser and email client work greatand reading a book is very nice with the ability to choose text sizes and brightness. I'm most impressed by wireless streaming of videos thru this device to my HDTV...just beautiful! The problem others have mentioned about a lack of 'Flash' video hasn't been a problem....it doesn't work but it hasn't kept me from anything except commercials I didn't want to see anyway! I'm planning on paying for Amazon Prime as soon as my free trial is up.

Reviews.Title: Still Having Issues with the Device
Reviews.Author: Kenneth M. Atcherson
Reviews.Content: I'm currently on my 4th Kindle device based upon the issues that I've had since my purchase at the end of April 2013. When the device works, it's a great device to use.  The size is just right without being bulky.  I also like the ability to download videos & documents from the cloud and to have apps store there without clogging up the device.When problems start with the devices I've had going into sleep mode on the own right during the middle of working on it tends to cause issues when using it for work.  This also becomes frustrating if in the middle of a game and the device goes into sleep mode when you're just about  to hit the high score.  Another issue I've had as been with the Silk Browser.  After utsing it over time it tends to get slower.  There aren't any other browsers available for use unless you want to rig the device and void your warranty.It Kindle can resolve these issues and  open up to more apps that can be accessed in Google Play, you would have an awesome device.  Not sure how the company plans to make this more of a work device versus just an entertainment device.  A free fully functioning application with MS Office would be great.

Reviews.Title: 8,9 kindle 4G lte 64
Reviews.Author: Michael K. T. Huie
Reviews.Content: I like it but slower than the 7in. wifi, would have been better with charge plug on the side, the first one had a problem and was replaced quickly

Reviews.Title: Exactly What I Needed from a Tablet
Reviews.Author: Kristy Hamman
Reviews.Content: I had long been debating whether or not I actually needed a Surface or iPad, and came to the conclusion that I did not. If you don't need all the bells and whistles of a much more expensive tablet, the Kindle Fire HD may just be for you! I wanted something that could hold a good charge, I could check my emails on, browse the internet, write the occational paper, take notes, and read easily. This definitely does the trick.
